11122131221.content:
The tremors began to become more and more frequent, forming a pattern of sorts. While earthquakes in California were a common thing, multiple earthquakes back-to-back were not. Eventually the booming quakes came to a screeching halt, and a large shadow casted over Hollywood Arts.

Robbie of course was the first to comment. "Hey? Who turned out the sun?"

It was probably just a could passing by, right?

WRONG!

"Hi guys, haha!"

All present paused as they recognized the loud voice. It was Tori's sister Trina. But why did she sound so loud and... high,,, Up? Everyone's jaws dropped when they looked up. It was Trina alright... an 100ft tall giantess Trina!

"How's the weather down there?" She teased.

"Holy cow." said Robbie.

"No way." Was Beck's reply.

"What... the... heck!" Jade said astonished.

Tori was bug eyed. "Oh my god! T-Trina!? Is that really you!?"

Said giant couldn't help but grin. "In the flesh. What do you guys think of the new me? Pretty great, huh?"

"How!?" Was their collective response.

"Like I'd tell you. You'd just try to get big yourselves and steal my spotlight." Trina explained with mild annoyance. There was no way she was going to let her little sister and her goof troop upstage her. Not again. This was her moment and she'd be damned before she shared it with anyone.

"We'd never do that." Tori laughed nervously. "Right guys?"

"Nope!"

"No way!"

"Yes we would." Jade said plainly.

"Jade!" Tori shrieked. What was wrong with her? Couldn't she see they were in a delicate situation here?

Trina's eyes narrowed.

"She didn't mean, Trian! You know how Jade gets." Beck quickly interjected. The last thing he wanted was for Jade to get on Trina's bad side. Funny considering five minutes ago he wouldn't have really cared.

"Yeah. Jade does have a big mouth." Robbie smiled before he felt Jade's eyes glaring daggers into him.

Tori gulped as she noticed her giant sister's eyes narrow further. Oh things were not going well.
11122131221.title: Big Sister Trina

1112213122111.content:
"Make me big too and we can both have fun with our frienimes." Jade suggested. She wouldn't outwardly admit it, but she was beyond jealous of Trina's new size. She was meant to be the big and scary one of the group, not Tori's annoying sister.

Said giant listened to the tiny goth's words and couldn't help but giggle. Was she for real? Did she honestly think she would ever even consider growing her anywhere near her height? She must be joking. There was no way she thought she was that stupid.

Jade didn't like the sound of that giggle, and she also didn't like knowing that even Trina's ear was bigger than her. Nervousness began to set in as Trina suddenly broke into hysterical laughter. Her voice was so loud it actually made Jade cover her own ears as well as the group down below.

"HAHAHAHA! Y-YOU'VE GOT TO BE KIDDING ME! HAHAHAHAHAHAHA! Y-YOU REALLY THINK I'D GROW YOU OF ALL PEOPLE TO MATCH ME! SERIOUSLY HAHAHAHAHAHAHA!"

Jade felt her heart drop at that. Trina didn't look like she was taking the bait. That didn't bode well for her. She needed to find a way to turn things in her favor. "C'mon! Think! You've gotten out of worse situations before." She muttered to herself.

Down below, Tori, Robbie, and Beck were growing more and more nervous as well. Jade was in a bad way and there was nothing they could do to help her out. Trina was far too big for them to handle. If only they knew how she got big or found a method to shrink her down.

After another solid minute of laughter, Trina finally settled down. Jade should've been a comedian instead of an actress because her stand up was top notch. As if she'd ever grow her to be her equal. "Oh man... I haven't laughed that hard in forever. Are you sure you want to be an actress Jades, because you're stand up is pretty good."

Jade was starting to sweat now. "Come on Trina, just think about it. Imagine what we could accomplish. We could be a real killer combo. One of a kind."

Trina was unimpressed by Jade's desperate attempts to gain some size. She really did think she was that stupid...

...Big mistake.

1112213122111331.content:
Trina was torn. On the one hand she didn't like Jade, but on the other she wanted to do everything in her power to remain in the spotlight. If Jade knew of a role for her than she had to take it despite the consequences. Ignoring the butterflies in her stomach, Trina reached into her back pocket and pulled out the ray.

"Alright Jade, I'll make you bigger... But this better not be a trick."

Jade was relieved that her plan had worked. It would seem that Trina was still a sucker for fame and fortune. She would never pass up the chance to be the star in anything. Oh how her selfish desires would come back to bite her.

The normal sized goth was gently placed on the ground before Trina took aim. "Don't move." She aimed the ray and fired.

All at once Jade felt her body heat up. It wasn't unpleasant in any way, in fact it actually felt quite nice. If Jade could compare it to something it would be like sinking to the bottom of a hot tub. "This feels nice." she sighed.

As she shut her eyes and basked in the warm fuzzy feeling of the ray, Tori and Co. were stunned into silence. It was both bizarre and fascinating to see Trina as a giant, but it was another thing to watch another human grow before their very eyes.

Rapidly Jades body was ascending higher and higher into the sky. It was amazing and at the same time horrifying. It also seemed that Trina was able to make all this possible thanks to the big gizmo in her hands. Where had she even gotten it?

That was a question for another day as soon Jade was waist length with Trina, then chest length, and finally ceased her growth when it appeared she was eye level with the original giant. The sight was incredible. One giantess had become two.

Beck was torn between freaked out and aroused, Robbbie… well he was Robbie, and Tori was outright terrified. A giant Trina she could somewhat deal with. A giant Jade on the other hand was another matter entirely. She already made her uneasy, but now she was legitimately scared of her.

Jade soon opened her eyes and when she did she noticed she was staring Trina dead in her own. Was she really a giant now? Looking around her, she saw the once towering city look like the equivalent of a Kaiju movie set. Complete with little actors.

"Jade?" Trina called, grabbing the goth's attention. "Hey? Earth to Jade! Is any body home!?"

"Yeah." she answered, eying the ray.

"So what's the role?"

111221312211133111.content:
Before Trina could react, she was enveloped by the ray. A wicked chill ran down her spine as she saw the world expanding around her. "No no no no no no no no no! This can't be happening!"

"But it is happening!" Jade teased as she continued to fire. Slowoly but surely she shaved more and more height off of Trina until finally the girl was once again back to her average height.

Trina looked down at her hands and silently cursed. She was normal again. An average joe like her sister and friends. She then looked back at the giant form of Jade. She knew she should be afraid, but anger overrode her rational.

"You damn traitor!" She roared. She couldn't remember the last time she felt this angry. Perhaps it was that one time she didn't win prom queen and tried strangle Shinjin?

While Trina was busy screaming her head off, Tori felt a open in her stomach. Her worse fear had become a reality. Jade was now a giant. Trina couldn't see through her deceit and was now reduced in size. Worse yet, she was yelling at Jade... Was she insane?!

"Wow!" Beck said in awe of his now giant girlfriend.

"I know." Robbie nodded.

"Guys?!" Tori shouted. "We need to do something before she hurts Trina!"

"Do we have to?" Back asked.

"Yeah, do we have to?" Robbie parroted.

Tori was annoyed now. "You know what... Forget you guys! I'll save her myself!" Tori paused for a moment as she watched her sister yell like a crazy person, this was nuts, but she had no choice but to intervene. "Trina?!"

"What?!" She growled as she turned her attention to Tori.

The other Vega's eyes widened. "LOOK OUT!"

"Wha…?" Was as far as Trina got before she found herself flying through the air. Tori watched in horror as Jade finger flicked her sister from behind. Even the boys could only watch as the poor normal sized girl soared through the air and into a nearby dumpster.

"Oooh! That's gonna leave a mark." Robbie winced.

Jade smirked, proud of her handiwork. "Now that the trash has been taken care of, it's just you and me now, Vega."

Tori was sweating bullets now. Jade was looking right at her. She wanted to run, but her fear kept her rooted in place like a tree. The giant sensed this and began to reach for her.

Tori could feel her blood run cold and her heart beating in her chest. Jade was going to crush her. This is how she was going to die.

The boys looked on with morbid curiosity as Jade reached over and plucked Tori from the ground. Ever since she'd come to Hollywood Arts, Beck knew Jade didn't like her. This was either going to end with the two of them kissing or one destroying the other.

"She's doomed isn't she?" Robbie questioned.

"Probably." Beck nodded.

Tori was scared beyond belief. Jade's face was huge and the ground was so far away. Oh god, what did she have in store for her.

Jade grinned. "I've been looking forward to this for a long time.

1112213122111332.content:
"Alright. You wanna be big, you have to do something for me first." Trina said firmly. She didn't know what this role Jade was talking about was, but there was no chance she'd pass up the opportunity to keep her star burning bright.

Jade felt a sense of relief wash over her at Trina's words. She was still gullible as ever. Dangle a carrot in front of her and she'd go chasing after it. Too bad for her there was no actual role. "Deal. So what do I have to do?"

While Trina tried to think of a task, on ground below, Tori's heart nearly stopped. Did Jade just bargain for height. She must have if her sister's words were anything to go by. This was bad. Very, very bad. If Jade became a giant then who knows what would happen.

"Guys! We have to stop Trina from growing Jade!" Tori panicked.

"Why?" Robbie asked, somewhat intrigued by the thought of a giant Jade.

"Yeah why?" Beck agreed for similar reasons.

"Are you being serious right now!" Tori shrieked. "It's Jade we're talking about! She'll use Trina for height, betray her, then destroy the whole town! Not to mention she'll most likely come after me."

Both buys looked at each other for a moment and then back to Tori. "Still not seeing the problem!" Robbie said.

"Beck!?" Tori hoped she'd get some support here.

Unfortunately that wouldn't be the case. "Sorry Tori, but there's nothing I can do. Good luck though."

Tori threw her hands up in frustration. "You guys are useless!"

"Pretty much, yeah."

If the guys wouldn't help her then she would just have to take care of this problem herself. She would much rather deal with an annoying giant than a dangerous one. She cupped the sides of her mouth... and screamed.

Meanwhile up above, Trina had finally come to a conclusion. "Alright, Jade. If you want to be big like me you have to earn the right. And what better way then giving my feet a relaxing massage."

Jade recoiled in disgust but quickly recomposed herself. It would all be worth it in the end once she got some--

"HEY!" a familiar voice called from down below. Looking down, both parties saw it was none other than Tori. "DON'T LISTEN TO JADE! SHE'S GOING TO BETRAY YOU! THE SECOND YOU MAKE HER BIGGER SHE'LL STEAL YOUR SPOTLIGHT. SHE'S JUST TRYING TO USE YOU!"

Jade was fuming at Vega's accusations, not that they weren't true... But still. "Shut up, Vega!"

While Jade started to go back and forth with Tori, Trina soaked in her sisters words. What she said made a whole lot of sense. Why was she even putting any trust in Jade at all? It should have been obvious from the get go that she would stab her in the back. She just wants her spotlight. Well not on her watch.

"Hey! Hey, Trina!" Jade waved. "Don't listen to Tori. She's just trying to spite me and you. That's totally something she'd do. So anyway, you wanted a... Foot massage, right?"

Trina smiled. Oh she had plans for Jade. "Yeah. A nice foot massage."

11122213.content:
"Hmm? Which feature should I use?" Cat wondered. The device was covered in all kinds of glowing buttons, but the ones that stood out the most were the ones labeled ''G'' and 'S''. It made her curious. "I wonder what this button does."

Without a second thought, Cat pressed down on the ''S'' button and watched as a blue beam fired. The redhead couldn't help but be enamored by the laser show. "Hahahahaha! It's a pretty blue light." she giggled.

After admiring the beam for another second, the Hollywood Arts student followed the path of the laser. Sure enough what she saw left her beyond surprised. Her Nona's rose garden was shrinking right before her very eyes. She was so stunned she released the button.

"Woah..." Cat said in disbelief. She crouched down to get a better look at the diminished rose garden and found the flowers to be little more than red specks in the dirt. This was impossible. "Nona's rose garden is so tiny now!"

This was incredible. This little device she got in the mail made the garden her Nona worked painstaking hard on tiny. She then looked back at the device and spied the ''G'' button. She just had to know what it did. Cat pressed down hard.

Her eyes then widened as she watched a red beam fire this time and engulf the little red specks on the ground. Sure enough they began to grow. The redhead began to giggle as she watched the plants grow right before her very eyes. She unfortunately held down the button for too long and by the time she let go the roses were as tall as her. Thorns and all.

"So cool." Cat smiled as she pressed the ''S'' button again and shrunk the plants. This went on for a while. Grow! Shrink! Grow! Shrink! Rinse! Repeat! Eventually it all ended when noticed the flashing red light informing her the device was overheating.

Bummer. That meant she was forced to stop until it cooled down. In the meantime she had all the time in the world to think of what she wanted to do with her new toy. Knowing that, Cat smiled before heading back inside.

Unbeknownst to her, a certain someone watching her little display with mad glee. Everything's going according to plan."

Fawn Liebowitz couldn't be more pleased.

11133211.content:
Jennifer Ann "Moze" Mosely couldn't have been more pleased with herself. She had managed to turn fantasy into reality. Thanks to a few comic books and a little aid from the notes she ''borrowed'' from Cookie, she'd managed to create something truly special.

A device that could control the aging process.

The idea seemed completely insane. After all a gun that could control aging was something reserved for books and movies. Supposedly Cookie was going to build this device to make himself more appealing to the ladies but gave up on it when Ned convinced him it was impossible.

Normally Ned gave good advice but Moze thought this was one time where he dropped the ball. A age changing gun was just too good an idea to file away and forget about. Thankfully for her she pocketed Cookie's notes when she and Ned where helping him clean out his locker.

Cookie's schematics and notes held so much promise. How could she not try and build it? It took a month's worth of hard work but in the end she managed to do it. The only question now was what was she going to do with it?

Truthfully she hadn't really put much thought into what would come after. Her main focus was making sure the dag on thing got built at all. Not to mention she had to get a side job to pay for the parts. There was just simply no time to put any thought into what she'd use the device for.

She had tested it on an old dog in the neighborhood and reverted it back into an energetic puppy. She knew for a fact it worked. So what now?

She could use this device to get famous. Just thinking about the money, cars, mansions, awards, and TV spots made her all giddy inside. But that would also mean sharing the wealth, something she didn't really mind. Without Cookie this ray wouldn't even exist.

Then again she could always use this device for some mindless fun. She could change everyone's ages to her hearts content. Or maybe... Maybe she could use it on herself? She could age herself up and become the epitome of beauty. That was an admittedly shallow idea but one that was appealing.

In the end Moze sighed. She just couldn't make up her mind. For now she would rest and deal with the ray conundrum tomorrow. Yea, that sounded good to her.

Sleep first...

…Ray tomorrow.
11133211.title: Mosely's Ray

111332112.content:
Cookie was not happy. He wasn't particularly angry, but not at all happy. While getting help cleaning out his locker, he noticed a specific set of notes were missing. His schematics for his age changing ray. It was to be his magnum opus and chance to be a part of the ''It Crowd'', but Ned convinced him it was impossible.

He wasn't wrong, the whole idea just sounded crazy. Life wasn't a cartoon or a video game. There were no hacks or cheat codes to get by. But it was still an idea he had put a lot of time into. But at the end of the day he decided Ned was right and stored his plans away.

No one else knew about them except his two friends. So imagine his shock when those notes vanished. At first he thought Ned took them but soon realized that was stupid. What would Ned need those plans for anyway? Suzi maybe? Nah. Those two were about as good as they were going to get.

Moze maybe? She was the only other person who knew about his notes. She had asked him what they were and he hastily stuffed them in a plastic bag. She saw them. Read them. Why not her? He could always ask if she took them, but then again she might deflect and accuse him.

Cookie didn't need that drama. Plus if he was wrong then he'd look like a jerk. No, he needed to play things carefully. This situation called for stakeout. For a whole month he'd staked out Moze's place and even observed her bizarre behavior. Getting a side job, buying parts from the electronic store. All her actions seemed suspicious.

Then again so did he. He was wearing a trash can as a disguise for pete's sake, and on some occasions people called the cops. He'd never ran so fast in all his life. Who knew when he was scared enough he could leave a German Sheppard in the dust?

He was about to give up until night fell. As he hid behind a tree with his binoculars handy, he spied the silver device in Moze hands. His jaw dropped. His baby had come to life. Moze had actually put it together. It looked exactly like it did in his plans and dreams. His gun was real... and Moze had it.

That wasn't fair! Yea, Moze built it but he came up with the plans. It was more his than hers and he wanted it back. The only question was did he break in and take it or wait until tomorrow?

Cookie grumbled. He hated making tough decisions.

1113321123.title: SE

11133211231.content:
Unfortunately for Cookie, Moze knew he was watching her. He wasn't as subtle as he like to believe. No one can be when being chased by a German Sheppard. That was the reason why she slept with one eye open... and installed her video camera by her window. A little paranoia was good for you after all.

Before going to be she slid her blinds closed and checked her video. Sure enough, Cookie was hidden in the background behind a tree holding a pair of binoculars. She was tempted to call the cops as that was kinda creepy. On the hand he might've seen the completed ray and was preparing to steal it.

That wouldn't do. Especially since she put so much time and effort into making it real. Yes Cookie came up with the designs but she built the dag on thing. It was more hers than his and she would use it. Feeling more than a little mischievous tonight, Moze reopened her blinds.

She knew Cookie was still watching. That was good. It was time to crush his hopes and dreams of ever taking her new toy from her. Moze held up the ray in plain view and turned her back. She could only imagine how frustrated Cookie was right now. He was really funny when he got upset.

Moze flipped a few switched and dials before setting the ray to a ripe age of twenty-five. She pointed the ray to herself... and pulled the trigger. There was a bizarre zapping sound before she felt her whole world change. Meanwhile outside, Cookie watched on in shock at what was happening in Moze bedroom.

He couldn't see her face as her back was turned, but he could still make out some changes. He did see the gun. The first thing he noticed was Moze height increase. She would definitely be taller than him, Ned, or even Suzi. The next thing he noticed was her hair seemed to be growing out as well. It grew to the point it reached her lower back. He also saw her figure turn more hourglass-like in shape. If he didn't only see her as a friend, he might try to hit on her.

Then just like that it was over. The changes ceased. Cookie leaned in closer, he wanted... No, needed to see more. Was his baby a complete success? Moze turned... And Cookie's jaw dropped. That couldn't be Mosely. That was a damn supermodel. It did work. His baby was a complete success. Her face, bust, hips... Everything had aged up. The age gun really worked! He had to remember to smack Ned the next time he saw him! THAT SHOULD'VE BEEN HIM!

Cookie went back to observing until he noticed Moze was looking... Dead at him. Cookie gulped. She knew he was there all along!? She gave him a sly smirk before holding up his gun and waving her free hand in a no-no gesture. She was taunting him. He couldn't do anything now. Not when she knew he'd be coming. It pained him, but he would half to accept defeat tonight and retreat.

Cookie stashed away his binoculars and made his way down the street, completely uncaring if Moze saw him or not. The gauntlet had been thrown. That ray would be his if it was the last thing he ever did. He looked up to the full moon and swore it.

"Watch out Moze. I won't forget this."

Moze was ready to take her new body for a stroll through town. It was the weekend, her parents were gone, and with any luck she'd run into Ned and Cookie. That would be all kinds of fun. Ned's reaction would be priceless if Cookie hadn't already told him. Then again knowing Ned he probably wouldn't believe him.

Cookie would be the only real problem she'd face. But considering she was now an adult there wasn't much he could do, though she'd still be warry. No leaving the age-gun at home and no leaving it unattended period. Thankfully she could stash it away in one of her mom's purses that she quote unquote, borrowed.

With that taken care of, she dressed her best and made her way into town. The walk had been fabulous. The weather was perfect and her new form seemed to garner a lot of attention. Somehow she'd managed to collect a few numbers, calling cards, and even got a few wolf whistle thrown her way.

That made her blush. She'd raided her mom's closet for a white tube-top, short-shorts, and opened toed sandals. Apparently that was the right choice as it made her new 'assets' all the more emphasized. Plus what guy and maybe a few girls would mind a beautiful figure showing a little skin? If you've got it then flaunt it.

The first thing Moze decided to do was look for Ned and Cookie. Knowing them they were together and most likely at one of Cookie's favorite places. The comic book store.

----

"I'm telling you Ned, Moze stole my designs and is now a twenty-something year old woman!" Cookie explained for the umpteenth time. Ned didn't believe him of course. Why should he? Cookie was spouting pure nonsense. There was also the fact that Cookie slapped him across for no apparent reason.

"I heard you for the millionth time. That still doesn't make anything you've said true though." Ned replied as he cracked open a comic. What Cookie was saying should be reserved for the paperbacks and heroes in colored undies. Not real life. Real life was complicated enough as it was.

"Why won't you believe me?" Cookie pleaded. Was it too much to have his best friend at least consider his words?

"One, because what you've said is impossible. Two, what you've said is impossible. And three, what you've said is impossible!" Ned finished.

"Fine! Don't believe me! Just wait until you see her." Cookie smile. "When you do I'll be there to rub it in your face and say I told you so."

"Sure Cookie. Sure."

----

"Moze finally reached the comic book store and was greeted by the familiar sound of the bell. The shop was mostly empty as per the norm. Honestly she was sure Cookie was the only reason this place wasn't closed down. The first one to spot her was the own who gave her slight smile while trying to look cool,

She of course responded with a casual greeting while trying to remain respectful. That guy was so not her type. She began browsing the isles until she heard two familiar voices. Moze peeked around the corner to see both Ned and Cookie talking by the bargain bin.

What luck! She found them on the first try and it was the two of them. Cookie looked to be trying to convince Ned that his gun was a success and of course Ned brushed off his words as fiction. Ned was a guy grounded in realism. Maybe that's why he liked more dark comics?

Oh well, it was time to make her move. "Excuse me boys."

Both Ned and Cookie turned to the sound of the voice. Their expressions varied. Cookie's was to be expected, his jealousy ran deep. Ned's on the other hand was exactly what she was hoping for. Gobsmacked was he. His brain must be going into overdrive trying to process her appearance and why she was talking to them.

"Could ether of you two help me. I just don't know what to look for." Moze feigned.

Ned finally recovered. "Sure. You got a name?"

Moze giggled. "The names Jennifer. Jennifer Ann Mosely. But my friends call me Moze!"

Ned's world shifted as he took in her words. He looked at her more closely and as he did he could make out the features of his other best friend. This was Moze?! Cookie's story was for real?!

"HA! I TOLD YOU SO!" Cookie gloated.

"Now young man it's not polite to gloat." Moze teased before ruffling Cookie's head. He didn't like that. She was treating him like a child. If only he had that ray. Did she leave it home? Did she have it on her? Did she hide it somewhere? He hated not knowing.

Moze broke into a full on laugh when Cookie swatted her hand away. She was so caught up in her own fun she failed to notice her purse swinging back and forth. When it did so, Cookie got a brief glimpse inside. It was only for a second but he could make out his gun in the handbag. She brought it with her! IT HAD TO BE HIS!

Cookie decided to...

11133211231223.title: SE

111332112312231.content:
Moze didn't really know what to do now that she had Ned and Cookie following her. She hadn't really gotten permission from their parents to watch them but they didn't need to know that. This just meant she now had power over them. But that led her back to her current problem.

She didn't know where to go from here.

She could have the boys do some mundane chores around town. Or maybe have them do something embarrassing like give her massage? That sounded good. Besides, who would say no to her? But then again, Cookie might try to make another grab for the ray. She honestly didn't expect him to be so bold as to try and take it out in the open like he did.

She'd need to make a mental note to punish him later.

"So Moze. What are we doing?" Ned asked. A valid question considering he had no clue what his now older friend had planned. He would ask Cookie but the nerd seemed to be seething.

"I--" before she could finish her sentence she spotted a familiar face not too far away. Suzi Crabgrass, Ned's little crush. Moze paused for a while until a lightbulb flashed in her mind.

"Hey? That's Suzi."

"You boys wait here. I'll be right back."

----

"I wonder what I'll do today?" Suzi wondered. "Maybe I could go to that new café that opened last month?"

"Ahem!"

That seemed to get Suzi's attention as she turned to see a complete stranger looking right at her. She was an older woman with a body to die for. It made her feel inadequate. Her bust just couldn't compare. "Can I help you?"

Moze smiled. "

----

"What do you think they're talking about over there?" Ned questioned.

"Don't know, don't care. All I care about is my ray gun." Cookie replied as he watched the two girls talk. He needed a solid plan to get the age changing ray. He had been too hasty before. He needed play this more carefully, that ray would be his.

Ned sighed. "I don't understand why you want it so bad. Why be in such a rush to grow up?"

"Do you really have to ask?" Cookie said.

The two' conversation would've continued but it came to a crashing halt when they saw Moze whip out the age changing ray. She pointed it a Suzi and fired. Both boys stood in awe as they watched their other girl friend age right before their very eyes.

Suzie's dark hair grew longer, her eyes sharper, and her face more mature. Her height increased somewhat and her other assets filled out rather nicely. Ned could now see why Cookie wanted that ray gun so bad. He might just have to make a grab for it himself.

Ned stood still as a statue as Suzi and Moze walked over. It was as if two of the most gorgeous goddesses in the world were coming to greet him. Life was good.

Cookie simply ground his teeth.

"Hey there, Ned." Suzi greeted.

"H-hey there, S-Suzi." he stuttered.

Moze giggled. "Alright boys, here's the deal. Suzi and I have come to a little understanding... Ned, you'll be going with her. Cookie, you'll be coming with me."

"O-Okay." Ned said all too eagerly.

Cookie also agreed surprisingly. No doubt plotting to spirit the age device away from her.

"Good. Glad to see everybody in agreement." Moze smiled.

Suzi grabbed Ned's hand and the pair quickly ran off.

That left Moze and Cookie all alone.

1113321123122311.title: Ned and Suzi P.O.V

11133211231223111.content:
It was no secret that Ned had feelings for Suzi, but never in a million years did he think he'd be massaging her feet while she kicked back and relaxed on the sofa. Make no mistake, he didn't mind giving the woman of his dreams sweet relief while she rested her little head. What he didn't like was her house rules.

There were only three. Simple and easy to remember. The first being that he remember his place since was now the adult and he was but a mere ''child''. That basically meant do whatever she told him. Rule two was no trying to sneak away. That was punishable by getting Moze to age him into a drooling toddler.

What bothered Ned the most however was rule three. No contact with Cookie. That one both confused and concerned him. No Cookie? That was like peanut butter with no jelly. Why couldn't he see one of his best friends? Were Suzi and Moze purposefully trying to keep them apart? And what was she doing to poor Cookie now? That question worried him the most.

"Make sure you get in between the toes. My feet are killing me from such a long walk." That broke Ned from his thoughts as he remembered where he was and what he was supposed to be doing. He'd been massaging Suzi's feet for almost half an hour and only now did she tell him to be extra thorough. Then again she knew Ned wouldn't complain. He hadn't so far. So why now?

"R-Right." he stuttered before carefully massaging his crush's digits. She had a nice pair too. Her skin was just so soft and the smell of strawberries filled his sniffer. Suzi obviously took good care of her feet. They looked like she'd gone to a spa recently. There was no way she could keep her nails that cut and shiny with what she had at home.

Even though the situation he found himself in was less than ideal... Ned would endure. After all he was literally getting to touch his crush in a way he'd only dreamed about. Not many guys can say that. He would worry about Cookie later and try to make contact when he could. Maybe when Suzi went to sleep? Cookie always did answer his phone.

Suzi let out a low sigh of contentment while Ned continued to please her. This was so exciting for her. She was older and stronger like she always envisioned herself in the future. Plus there was the added bonus of Ned Bigby giving her a foot massage. Things couldn't get any better than this could they?

Another sigh escaped her before a lightbulb went off. Perhaps it could. "Hey Ned?"

"Yeah?"

"Do you mind running a bath for me later? After a long and bizarre day like this a nice soak would be great." Suzi smiled.

"A-A bath?" Ned's brain stalled. In fact his whole body did. Suzi Crabgrass... The Suzi Crabgrass had just asked/ordered him to run her a warm watery bath. Was the universe rewarding him for all the good deeds he's done over the years? If so than hallelujah.

"S-Sure thing." He gulped.

"Good. It wasn't like I'd accept no for an answer anyways." smirked Suzi. The massage continued on for another solid thirty before a booming sound caught both their attention. Thunder? That was soon fallowed by the sound of several tiny pellets assaulting her window. Rain? A storm had rolled though. That meant Ned definitely wouldn't be going anywhere if he tried to violate rule two of Suzi's house rules. That put another smile on her face as idea after idea came to her. What if the power went out too. Oh what could she have him do for her in the dark while they wait for the light to return?

"That's enough for now, Ned." Suzi ordered. "I don't know how bad this storm will be, so while I check the news you can run my bath, capiche?"

"I understand." Ned nodded. He then dipped away while Suzi flipped on the TV with the remote. While she watched the news Ned was already upstairs running her bath. He made sure it was extra bubbly. Also, who knew Suzi used a luffa? "No, no, no! Get your head on straight! You need to find a way to check on Cookie."

He could try to contact him now while Suzi was distracted, or he could wait until she was fast asleep. In the end, Ned decided to...

1113321123122311122.content:
"Okay, I'll have to punish you." Hearing those words from Suzi made Ned's heart sink. Punishment!? Just what did she mean by punishment?

"W-What are you g-going to do t-to me?" Ned stuttered.

He received no answer. Suzi grabbed his wrist before he could even blink and slammed the door shut. The next thing he knew his school crush was dragging him up the stairs while he kicked and screamed like a fussy baby.

Ned suddenly found himself thrust into the bathroom as Suzi locked the door behind them. Ned felt scared now, this whole situation was reminiscent of one of Cookie's mystery comics. Hopefully there'd be less blood and gore involved.

"Sit!" Suzi ordered. Ned obeyed. "I can't believe you tried to run away. How could you just ignore my house rules like that!? What a disrespectful child you are. No matter, I know just what to do to disobedient children. Disobedient children need to be punished."

Ned didn't like the sound of that. Every word of Suzi's mouth was like ice. He felt as if a lump had formed in his throat. Ned cursed the horrible misfortune that had lead him here and he cursed the storm for foiling his escape. He never once blamed Suzi though. He just couldn't bring himself too.

The older woman turned her eyes to the bath and back to Ned. It was time to discipline the boy. "Clothes off now."

Ned's brain stopped. "What?"

Suzi grabbed the luffa. "I said clothes off. If your feeling embarrassed you can keep your boxers but the rest has to go."

Not wanting to anger his crush any further, Ned did as he was told and discarded his wardrobe, with the exception of his 'Cowboy Cookies' underwear. He felt so embarrassed. Not even Cookie or Moze knew he had these. He'd never be able to wipe this moment from his memory.

Pleased by his obvious embarrassment, Suzi continued. "IN!"

It was a simple order and Ned complied. The tub water was warm and felt good against his skin. This had originally been meant for Suzi, but it looks like it was his now. Too bad his new oppressor had other plans. Suzi lathered up the luffa with liquid soap, and went to work.

Ned almost screamed as Suzi bore down on him with her luffa. The washed his skin as fast and rough as she possible could with her newfound strength. Ned never knew a luffa could double function as a torture device.

Scrub and scrub she did, making sure to start with his arms. She forcefully held Ned's arm out and scrubbed along his skin. Once that was finished she went straight for his armpits and repeated the process on the other side of his body.

Ned wanted to yell to her to stop being so rough but was quickly silenced by an intense glare. Why did women have to be so scary? His neck and back were next fallowed by his chest and stomach. It was painful and Ned had no doubt he was probably cleaner than he ever was in his whole life. She scrubbed him so hard his skin had turned red. He looked like a sunburnt lobster.

Now it was time to get to his legs. The less said about that the better. With her mission complete. Suzi threw down the luffa and went into the bathrrom drawer. Ned dreaded what she would pull out. Suzi turned to face him to reveal a bottle of no tears shampoo.

Ned gulped as Suzi lathered her hands with it's contents. He had no to try and duck out of the way before she dug into his scalp with her hands and nails. Ned shut his eyes in discomfort while Suzi left not a part of the scalp untouched. When that was finally finished, Suzi dunked his head under the water to clean out his hair.

Ned gasped for air once Suzi let go and finally drained the tube. Hearing the drain go was like music to his ears. It was sweeter than the sweetest melody. At last it was over... Or so he thought.

"OUT!" Suzi demanded. Ned didn't need to be told twice. He stood by her side shaking as the cold air touched his skin. "Now to brush that maw."

Ned saw the toothbrush she'd set up and tried to make a break for it only to remember that she'd locked the door. He was once again ensnared by his crush who looked more furious than ever. She grabbed the toothbrush and held it dangerously.

"You never learn do you?"

What fallowed was the most traumatizing two minutes of Ned's life. He'd never be able to brush his teeth or use mouthwash again. He;d be a 'Tic Tac' gut from now on.

Ned now stood in Suzi's parents room in only a towel. He'd long since ditched the drenched boxers. Suzi had ordered him to wait for her return as she found him something to sleep in. He didn't dare to try anything again. Suzi then returned holding his sleepwear... one of her yellow nightgowns and a pair of pink women's underwear.

Ned's face turned reder that a tomato. He couldn't wear this. "I can't wear this!"

"You can and you will. This is a special addition to your punishment since you tried to run again."

"Please don't make me Suzi." Ned pleaded.

Suzi was unmoved. "You can either put them on or I can force them on. Your choice."

With nothing but defeat in his eyes, Ned obeyed. He slipped on the gown and underwear with ease and hated to admit to himself that they were beyond comfortable. He'd never felt more emasculated in all his life.

"Now don't you look adorable." Suzi cooed. "Now off to bed with you. I'll even tuck you in."

Ned fallowed her orders to the letter and she tucked him in and kissed him goodnight. He didn't reply back. What could he say to this... Monster?

"Sleep tight. Don't let the bedbugs bite."

Suzi closed the bedroom door behind her, leaving Ned in complete darkness.

Ned was sure the universe hated him. Once again he found himself at Suzi's feet, massaging everything from her toes to her soles. Moze had even thrown he own feet into the mix. Both women made it clear that he and Cookie were to be their own personal slaves.

Speaking of Cookie, the guy had been forced to act as a butler. Getting both the girls drinks or snacks whenever they ordered. Ned could see Cookie was using all his self control to not lash out, but at least he knew he was okay. At least he wasn't forced to wear any of Moze's old clothes.

"Harder Ned." Suzi ordered. Ned of course complied with his crush's demands, she made it very clear she was a complete sadist when it came to delivering punishments. Never again did he want a repeat of what happened last night. He hadn't even told Cookie even though he'd asked.

Ned knew he couldn't tell his friend what happened. If he did then Cookie might snap and get punished like he did or worse. Moze had his age ray after all so who's to say she can't turn him into a toddler or a babbling old man? The thought made Ned shudder. Just how many years could these two steal or take back?

"Faster Ned." Moze commanded. Said boy did as he was told. Harder and faster he worked on both women's feet as they reclined on the living room sofa. While he knew what Suzi feet were like already, he now got a good look at Moze's. Her weren't to shabby neither. She must've also gotten her nails painted recently because that red coat looked way too fresh. Perhaps she had Cookie do it?

"More Lemonade please." Moze smiled.

"Oh, and some cake would be nice." Suzi added.

Cookie growled but never the less walked back into the kitchen. He was beyond livid. He was being forced to do their bidding like a butler. This was not was his device was intended to be used for. As much as he hated it, there was nothing he could do. Well, except maybe spit on the girl's meals. Then again he did that with everything he served them today anyhow. Might as well keep it up no matter how petty.

He made sure to add a little 'extra' to both girl's orders before meeting them back in the living room. He was still seething even after they took their respective orders, but at least he gained a small bit of satisfaction knowing what their eating/drinking. His attention then went back to Ned.

A part of him blamed his for everything that happened. If Ned hadn't told him how impossible his device seemed then he would be the one in control. Instead Moze built it and now he was nothing more than a man servant. But another part of him knew it'd be wrong to blame the guy. After all his response to the idea was understandable. It's only natural to believe something like an age changing device was nothing more than fantasy.

That still didn't stop him from being pissed off though. Even seeing Ned stuck in Suzi's old clothes couldn't abate his anger. He needed to get that ray away from Moze. Too bad for him she had it hidden away in her room somewhere. If only he could just making up those stairs and tear that place apart.

"Oh Ned." Moze called. "As you can see the bottom of my sole is pretty dirty, do you mind washing it for me?" Ned knew it wasn't really a request so much as it was a demand. He nodded. "Good... Now lick it clean will you."

The room froze... What?

"Well?" She asked.

Ned looked over to Suzi who merely shrugged. He then looked over to Cookie who was looking at him wide-eyed. This was bad. He looked down at Moze's soles to see they were in fact as dirty as she claimed. He knew she could easily clean them herself and that this task was only to humiliate him further. The only problem was refusing these girls would be hazardous to his health.

Just what was he going to do...?

111332221212131.content:
"PEEK A BOO, I SEE YOU!"

To say Freddie's face was priceless would be an understatement. The way his eyes almost practically bulged from their sockets and the way his jaw hung loose, you'd think he was doing a near perfect imitation of the scream. The only real difference being that Freddie wasn't in fact a painting and actual sound came from his mouth.

The way his voice shrieked and rose in pitch was truly something to behold. Carly never knew his voice could climb so high. Add to that he was flat on his back staring directly at the only visual he had through the window of their studio... her enormous eye.

This prank was turning out far better than she'd ever hoped. She would have to remember to thank Sam for dropping this little gizmo off. "HEY FREDWARD! NOTICE ANYTHING DIFFERENT!" Carly teased.

"C-Carly?" Freddie stuttered. He was beyond shocked and more than a little scared, but he recognized that voice anywhere. He slowly began to stand on wobbly legs. "I-Is that really you?"

The giantess smirked. "OF COURSE IS IT. WERE YOU EXPECTING SAM!?"

All color drained from the normal sized boy's face at the mere mention of the aggressive blonde. A giant Carley was more than enough, a giant Samantha Puckett spelled total disaster. Speaking of giant disasters...

"So..." Freddie began nervously "H-How did all this... H-happen!?"

"MAGIC!" Carly lied.

"Really?"

"NO!" The giant internet celeb giggled. "MAGIC'S NOT REAL! ALL THIS HAPPENED BECAUSE OF A LITTLE GIFT I RECIEVED!"

"Gift?" He dared ask.

"THAT'S RIGHT! A BELATED BIRTHDAY GIFT FROM DEAR OLD SAM!"

"That explains it." Freddie whispered before feeling a buzz from his pocket. He pulled out his phone to see it was a text from his mom. He ignored it. This was far more important. "Alright. So what are you going to do with your new inches?"

Hearing that gave Carly pause. What was she going to do with this newfound power? So far all she really wanted to do was prank Freddie and that had been pretty fun, but now that was over. She could use her new height to boost iCarly's popularity on the web....

...Or she could use her new height to go mess with Nevel or something.

What to do? What to do?

11133222121213131.content:
"I'm gonna go grow Sam and we'll do a giantess episode of iCarly." Carly explained as she continued her journey towards Sam's house.

Freddie's eyes widen. Sam? She was going to grow Sam of all people? Sam plus giant equaled destroyed city and dead Freddie. No! He had to stop her. "Carly, that's not a good idea!"

The giantess ceased her movement, the cars on the street bumping into her sneakers. "What do you mean it's not a good idea? Can you imagine the views we'd gets? No one else is doing this."

"But you're talking about growing Sam of all people! Sam!' Freddie tried to reason. "You know as well as I do that she'll abuse her height and then me! She always goes after me!"

Carly merely laughed him off. "She doesn't always go after you."

Freddie raised an eyebrow. Was she being for real right now? "The never kissed a girl incident, the average name calling at school, the hits, not to mention after you found out we kissed she tried to strangle me! Those moments don't leap out at you?"

Carly bit her lip. He had a point. Sam did do all that stuff to him. Granted none of it was done with any kind of malice outside of the kissing incident, but Sam still did a lot of nice things for him too. They were just far few in between.

"It'll be fine." Carly assured. "I'll keep you safe."

"Carly I'm really not comfortable with this." Freddie said. Before the two could continue the conversation, Freddie's phone buzzed.

"You gonna answer that?" Carly asked.

Freddie pulled out his phone to see his mom's number again. He thought about answering, but decided against it. This was still far too important.

"Who was it?"

"Mom." Freddie answered.

"Say no more." Carly understood Mrs. Benson was a bit overbearing. "Back to the Sam debate."

"Yeah. Don't do it."

Carly hummed. Freddie really didn't want her to grow Sam, but at the same time she really wanted to for their show. Just what was she supposed to do here?
11133222121213131.title: The Sam Debate

choices: The police arrive on the scene
111332221212131311.content:
"I understand your concerns Freddie, but I really want Sam to grow for a giant edition of iCarly." Carly stated. "And if you're still afraid Sam will come after you then I'll take care of it, okay?"

Freddie didn't like this, in fact her outright hated this. But at the same time there wasn't actually anything he could do to stop Carly from doing whatever she wanted. With a resigned sigh, he accepted Carly's decision. "Fine. Just don't let her manhandle me... more than she already does."

The giantess smiled. "Don't worry, I'll keep you safe."

The normal sized boy felt himself relax at hearing those words and seeing that smile. Carly always seemed to have this bizarre effect on him. As long as she kept Sam at a distance then he guessed he could help with the show. "Alright Carly, I'm trusting you."

"Awesome. Now let's go." Carly continued her trek to Sam's house, carefully maneuvering around the buildings and cars. Within minutes they were in front of Sam's humble home. Carly knelt down and gently knocked on the window.

"This is gonna be good." Freddie grinned just thinking about the blonde's reaction.

The blinds flipped up and the window opened. "Alright, who knocking on my... Woah momma!"

"What is it?!" A voice called from inside.

"Not you mom!" Sam shouted back before turning her attention back to her giant best friend and the geek on her shoulder. "Sooo? How did this happen?"

Carly and Freddie giggled at the shocked blonde's reaction. It was rare for Sam to be genuinely surprised like this, so seeing her bewildered expression was great.

"I'll tell you later. Hop on." Carly extended her hand and Sam's eyes bulged.

"Mom! I'm going out!" Sam called before cautiously stepping into Carly's palm. She immediately felt the air rush around her when the giantess rose to her feet. It was then she got a good view of the city and how high up she really was. "Oh my god!"

"I know, right." Said Freddie.

Sam could only watch in awe as Carly carefully navigated the city, cars and people hastily moving out of the way. This was equally amazing as it was terrifying. Now she wished she could be a giant.

After a few minutes of walking, the group was back at the iCarly studio. "That was awesome!" Sam grinned.

"It is after you get over the linger fear of falling." Freddie added.

"Whatever Fredward." said the blonde. "So how did this happen?"

Carly then went on to explain that it was the package she gave her for her birthday and how she grew and pranked Freddie. That got a little laugh out of Sam. Carly then went on to explain her plan for a giant edition of iCarly and Sam was all or it. She was really wanted to become a giant next.

"That's a great idea. We'll be internet legends!"

"I know. People will talk about us forever." Carly mused. "So are you ready to get big?"

"Totally!"

Carly then picked up Sam and gently placed her on the ground outside. She pulled out the ray and opened fire. Sam felt her body tingle and before she knew it, the world around her began to dwindle away. Soon she passed Carly's knee, the thighs, then waist and soon she was eye-to-eye with her fellow giant.

Freddie slowly backed away when he saw the giant Sam. One of his worst fears had just come to life. He just had to remember Carly would protect him. He set up his camera and began to get ready.

It was time to make magic.
111332221212131311.title: 2 Giants

1113322212121313111.content:
"Okay, were live in 5... 4... 3... 2..."

"Hello, I'm Carly!"

"And I'm Sam!"

"And today we have a very special edition of iCarly." The host smiled. "As you can see, Sam and aren't in our usual studio and instead are outside!"

"Where the wind blows!" Sam added.

Freddie made sure to angle his Camera from the window to get a good view of the city. So far things were going good, he just hoped things would stay this way.

"Now to clear up any sort of confusion, no we are not standing in a model city." Carly elaborated. "This here is the genuine article."

"The real McCoy!" Sam cut in. If you look outside right now you'll probably see two of your favorite internet celebs standing right outside and covering up the sky. This is our one..."

"And only..."

"Giantess edition of iCarly." Both hosts finished together.

Carly again took the lead. "Now you're probably wondering how we got so big for this huge event. Answer: It doesn't matter! Instead we're going to put our new sizes to good use and bring you some quality programing."

"That means we're going to pretty much do all sorts of crazy things like crushing cars." Said Sam.

"Sitting on buildings."

"Messing with people."

"Eating tones of food."

"Messing with people."

"Lifting heavy things."

"Messing with Freddie."

"What?" Carly asked.

"I said Kaiju battles." Sam lied. Freddie began to sweat.

"Alright! So let's get this show started."

111333313.content:
With everything set, True quickly made her way outside the building drawing some attention from her peers and coworkers as she rushed by them. She didn't mind, after all, pretty soon a lot more people would be staring at her, though perhaps with a very different look in their eyes. Before long, she had made her way outside into the parking area, the perfect place to grow to her desired height without needing to worry about getting stuck in a room or the building collapsing around her.

Looking around to make sure no one else was nearby, True fired the ray and almost instantly shot up to over 40 feet. She didn't have an exact number on how big she was, but she had to be somewhere between 40 and 50 feet and it felt awesome. True's height now rivaled most of the buildings that surrounded her. Onlookers down below stared up in awe, fear, and in some cases excitement as the massive dark legs stretched up over them. Thankfully for her, her clothes grew up with her. But for now, True wanted to have some fun with her newfound height and power. There was no denying things now. True was definitely in charge here. Looking down, she saw some people running away, and some just standing there staring at her. She loved these reactions and quickly looked around for a few people of interest.
111333313.title: Truly Large VP

1113333131.content:
Looking back at the building she just exited, True smirked as she leaned down a bit peeking through the office rooms and spying their inhabitants fleeing in terror as her large eyes stared in at them. But finally she found her intended target. Sitting in the room, seemingly unaware of True's little growth spurt was the biggest pain in her butt, Amanda. True smirked a little, thinking of making that expression a bit more literal before brushing such thoughts away... for now at least. By this point Amanda was starting to notice the sudden disappearance of the sunlight that was coming through her window earlier. Looking up she saw a large wall of dark skin outside which soon shifted to reveal a frighteningly familiar face. Amanda was left speechless as she saw True's grinning face looking through her window. It almost felt like she was looking out from a dollhouse at a large kid ready to play. Only this wasn't a dollhouse, it was her work building and that wasn't a child, though she might treat True like one. And right about now she was starting to wish she didn't.

Amanda tried to get up but her legs refused to work. True gingerly pulled the window open, and leaned closer. "You know, ever since I got this job, you told me how little kids have no place in a position like mine. As you can see I took care of that little problem rather effectively don't you think?" Amanda didn't respond. She didn't know how. She was mostly in shock over True's gargantuan form and that look in her eyes. As she saw true's hand reach in, her legs finally decided to work as she managed to force herself to her feet and tried to flee like the others. But unfortunately for her, True's hand was much faster and before long, the fingers caught her and carefully pulled their catch outside. Though she struggled to get free initially, once True had her out of the window, Amanda ceased all struggling and looked down in fear before looking back up at True, unsure which fate would be worse. True used a finger to rub amanda's hair in a demeaning fashion really rubbing it in that now True was the big one and Amanda was nothing more than an annoying little doll to her. Someone completely at the mercy of the VP she was once so mean and condescending towards. "Now, let's discuss your work here."

111333313141.content:
As True’s fingers tormented the living doll both physically and psychologically with this extreme reversal of fortune, she looked in at Amanda’s office. Other than some things the two of the knocked over as True reached in to grab her prize, the room was very clean and well kept. The fingers finally stopped petting and demeaning their prey for now as the gigantic girl lifted Amanda up a bit. “Lately I’ve been thinking about some corporate reconstruction here at Mad Style and honestly, I feel like someone of your talents is wasted in your current position.” True suddenly turned her hand so that Amanda was now facing her office. To her horror, Amanda watched as True reached in with her free hand and with a few simple gestures, crushed and destroyed everything she had set up, and tossing whatever she could grab off into the distance. What remained was an empty room with bits of debris remaining and virtually no trace that anyone worked in there recently.

Before she could work up the nerve to protest True shifter her closer to her face once more giving her a rather intimidating view of her mouth up close. “I believe this solution I developed will benefit us all. But first. Let’s take this somewhere a bit more private.” The older woman was unable to fight back as True tugged the back of her pants and panties open and gingerly slid her in so that she was wedged snugly between her large and warm cheeks. “As you can see, I arranged your very own personalized transport. Very fancy and exclusive stuff just the way you like. Hope you don’t mind the smell.” True teases as she released the pants with a snap leaving Amanda in a smelly darkness. True grinned as she felt the woman struggle hopelessly. She gave her rear a few shakes to taunt her further before moving away from the crowded area. She wanted a place to enjoy this power trip without any unwanted interruptions from the rest.

Roughly 10 minutes have passed. Amanda still hadn’t stopped fighting this awful fate. But of course it did little more than tickle and amuse her tormentor. True made her way to an large old warehouse that was pretty much abandoned. Big enough to fit her new height and remote enough to keep distractions away. The perfect combination for her. But first she needed to reach there unnoticed. So after making her way almost a mile or two away from her goal. True brought the ray back out and shrunk herself back to her normal height. To her delight she felt Amanda getting smaller as well leaving her at the size of a doll whole True was back to her original height. As she walk through she noticed that he people somehow didn’t put two and two together to figure out that that giant they saw moments ago was right there walking among them. She soon picked up the pace a bit, feeling her cheeks pummel their toy even more. “This really is the perfect place for you.” She said to herself nearing her goal. As she snuck in she quickly entered an office room off to the side and looked around to make sure the coast was clear. Happy with the result, True pulled her pants down and grabbed the doll sized Amanda. The poor woman was now battered and covered in sweat from the little exercise True had.

Amanda whimpered as trues attention was back on her, soon being placed on the ground by her shoes. Unable to do anything but wait for her godlike tormentor to decide her fate. “As you can see, there’s been a bit of downsizing going on.” She laughed at her joke “but your new position as my personal special assistant will definitely suit your talents much better than your old one.” And with that, she kicked off her shoes and got ready to give her toy her first command.

1113333131411.content:
Amanda stared up at the two large soles resting in front of her. They softer colors, the wedges and grooves, the bits of sweat and lint she saw scattered across the twin surfaces. the toes wiggled a bit as they enjoyed their freedom from their usual confinement, causing a small odor to hit Amanda’s nostrils. True let out a long sigh as she enjoyed the feeling as well as the look of horror that was stuck to her pets face.

“Much better!” She said happily as the feet slid closer to their toy. “Now, your first job will be to rub my feet. They could definitely use some help relaxing after the busy day they’ve had.” Amanda shouted various protests up at True, but of course, seeing a doll argue against her only amused her even more. Amanda continued to speak out against the girl looming over her, but was silenced when the feet suddenly shifted to her sides and pressed together. Amanda now found herself struggling and squirming about desperately as true’s feet sandwiched her doll sized body between them, rubbing her back and forth rubbing off some of the sweat, dirt, and lint onto her body. She was horrified. She was disgusted. She... was hopeless. The thought sank in. She still wanted to fight it, but sadly this wasn’t a battle she could win. True kept Amanda pinned in place as she savored the weak struggles. It wasn’t the foot rub she asked for, but it felt a lot more satisfying to be honest.

After ten minutes of this, True opened the feet up, surprised to see that Amanda was gone. Then she saw her stuck to her left foot, held in place like she was glued to it. “I see you’re adjusting to your new position very quickly” she teased as she pressed the back of Amanda’s head into the sole.

“Hey I got an idea!” Lulu said excitedly as she stands over Amanda trying her best to scare her. “Why don’t we let her run around like a little mouse while we try to step on her. Winner gets to keep her for the next hour.” Amanda did not like this suggestion at all, but unfortunately she was in no position to influence the decision. True on the other hand was very receptive to the idea. “That sounds like fun!” She then looked down at Amanda smugly, “I’m sure you heard her. And I don’t think there’s any other rules that need explaining so get running.” Amanda was horrified at how quickly True agreed to this twisted game. “And make sure to put up a challenge. Otherwise I’ll be very disappointed in you when I keep you.” Lulu added as her foot raised.

Amanda finally managed to start running just as Lulu’s bare foot fell inches from her position. The step wasn’t going to hit her. It was simply to toy with her and get her going. “Fe fi fo fum!” Lulu chanted from above as she lifted the foot again, this time trying to get the smaller woman. Amanda moves quick and barely dodged before running under True to make this harder for Lulu. Of course she wasn’t out of the woods as True started shifting her feet trying to knock her over to make her easy to get. Though the massive foot did bump her a few times, she managed to stay up and keep running.

This was all too much. Amanda was not going to be able to keep this up for long. She needed a safe spot to hide. Some place to bide her time and maybe get away from these two massive tormentors. But where? She definitely didn’t have time to think as True’s foot just barely missed her. She could only rub aimlessly trying to find anything resembling a safe spot.

111333313141131411131.content:
“I was thinking we should do a round two of this little game. Only this time I was thinking we use a bigger playing field.” Lulu suggested as she pointed to the ray. True looked uncertain of this plan.
“I don’t know. I was hoping that we could stay here where no one would notice or get in our way.” True reasoned, though her friend wasn’t exactly convinced by this.
“Come on, True! Who is going to stop us. We’re like goddesses to everyone else.” Lulu stopped for a moment as she thought about that last bit. “Actually that gives me a great idea for later. But for real, nothing they can do can possibly stop us. They’re all like little bugs compared to us. I doubt they could even tickle us if they tried.” Lulu was clearly getting into this as she looked more and more excited. True however was still a bit concerned with causing too much trouble and possibly harming some of the tiny people in the city. Still she had to admit Lulu did have a point. And she would be lying if she said the thought of towering over the world looking down on everyone else for once didn’t sound like a fun time.

“Alright you win. But you gotta promise not to go too crazy with this. At least not right away.” Lulu’s eyes seemed to glow as her friend told her that they were actually going to go through with this idea. Amanda, who had spent this entire exchange trying to free herself from Lulu’s grip had tired herself out and was now laying against the fingers trying to catch her breath.
“You better save some of that energy, we’re going to have a much bigger playing field for the second round.” Lulu taunted as she set the smaller woman on the floor. Amanda watches as both giantesses exited the warehouse seemingly leaving her alone. She was confused at first but soon everything started to shake violently. Before she knew what was going on, the roof was ripped away and staring down at her we’re True and Lulu. Only this time they were even bigger. Their gigantic forms dwarfed everything round them, and the tall buildings were more or less dollhouses to them. Needless to say, Amanda was more terrified than ever.

“Much better.” Lulu said as she looked back at the rest of the city, seeing many people fleeing their homes and offices in terror. Though there were sure to be people still remaining, it did give her a bit more freedom to cut loose and see what she could do at this size. With a casual push she watched as a nearby warehouse was crushed under her foot. True looked a bit worried at first but it was clear that she was feeling a rush of power from this as well. Before long both of the titanesses were staring back down at their captive plaything. “Ready to play. Go hide somewhere in the city and we’ll go look for you. But don’t try to cheat or run away. You won’t want to find out what the penalty is.” True said as they watched Amanda waiting to see what would happen.

The ground shook around Jimmy as he worked. "Oh no. She couldn't be..." He begins to say before the ceiling trembled as Cindy pulled out the entire shed that covered Jimmy's underground lab.

"But she is." She taunts as she slightly heard his panic while she sets aside the shed. "And now I've got you cornered in your little lab like a rat in his cage. I think I'll play with my new rat a little."

With that threat, Cindy began to reach into the bunker where Jimmy was. "Uh oh. I gotta get out of here." He says as he makes a run for it, hoping to just make it to his rocket to blast off to safety so he can finish the new shrink ray.

11221.content:
Timmy ran up the stairs at top speed. His worst nightmare for spring break had actually come true. His parents were going to be gone all week and were leaving him alone with Vicky. He couldn't survive with Vicky for a whole week, he could barely survive one day.

He needed a way out of this. Thankfully he had two fairy godparents he could turn to. He burst through his bedroom door and ran straight to his fish bowl. "Guy! Guys! My parents are going away for a whole week and are leaving me here,,, With Vicky!"

The two yellow goldfish poofed away in a puff of smoke and revealed themselves to be none other than the pink and green fairies Timmy's come to love... Cosmo and Wanda. Both fairies gasped in unison at the news. Vicky was cruel and mean and they knew that from personal experience. It's why they sent to him in the first place.

"Oh no!" Cosmo freaked. "Alone for a week with Vicky. Oooh we gotta get out of here!"

"Calm down Cosmo." Wanda ordered. She then turned her attention back to the buck toothed boy. "What do you want to do Timmy? Whatever it is it has to be quick because all the fairies in Dismdale are being called back to fairy world for an important meeting."

"What! You guys are leaving? How am I supposed to survive against Vicky?" Timmt shrieked.

"Uh... Wands... Wings... Fairies." Wanda gestured sarcastically.

"Right." Timmy understood.

"Here a crazy idea. Vicky only babysits you because she's older than you, right? So why not make yourself older." Cosmo smiled.

Wand didn't look too pleased. "Because the last time that happened we were almost picked up by the fair cab."

Cosmo didn't look deterred. "Yeah, but what if he had a remote that could change his age with the push of a button? That way he can change back at any time."

Wanda was about to argue until she realized something. "Wow. That's actually not a bad idea. Are you feeling alright Cosmo?"

The question was answered by the green haired fair picking corn out of his ear. He was clearly fine.

"That's a great idea!" Timmy agreed. "If I was an adult I could totally survive a week with Vicky! Cosmo, Wanda, make it so."

"Cosmo one, Wanda Zero." Cosmo cheered as he and Wanda made Timmy's wish a reality. The pink hatted child held out his hand as a pink remote fell into his hand.

"Wow." he said in awe.

"There you go sport. One age altering remote." Wanda would've said more but a beeping sound caught her attention. Sh looked down at her watch to see she and her husband were about to be late. "Sorry Timmy, you know the rules, we'll be back soon, bye!"

"Bye Timmy." Cosmo added before both fairies vanished.

Timmy looked down at the remote again and smiled. Surviving Vicky would be a breeze. He had at least a few minutes before Vicky arrived. It was time to test this baby out. He walked into the bathroom and looked himself over in the mirror before turning his attention back to the remote.

With this he could become an adult and survive Vicky. But did he want to be an adult immediately? Maybe he should test it by turning into a teenager first? Or perhaps he should test it on someone else?

Timmy thought long and hard and decided...
11221.title: Timmy's Remote

choices: Vicky takes timmy with her to another gig
112212.content:
"Maybe I should at least test it on a teenager setting first." Timmy said to himself. He set the pink remote to age sixteen before pointing it on himself. He shut his eyes tight... and fired. He felt a warm and tingly sensation run through him as the magic did it's work.

When the feeling died down he slowly cracked open his eyes and looked himself over in the mirror. What he saw left him shocked. He was taller. Much taller than he was before. His hair was a teeny bit longer and his face was definitely a bit older. He still had the buck teeth though. That irked him

"Woah. What! Is that my voice?!" Timmy asked aloud. Even his voice sounded different. Was this what it was like to be a teenager? He suddenly felt his stomach growl. Why was he so hungry all of a sudden? Oh well, he was sure there were some left over nachos in the fridge, He pocketed the remote and headed to the kitchen.

While on the way down he heard a knock at the door. He thought about answering it before it was violently booted down. An eerie presence suddenly filled the house as a dark figure entered through where the door used to be. Lightning seemed to flash behind them out of nowhere as a familiar evil laugh filed the Turner home.

"Guess what twerp?! It's just you and me for the rest of spring break! HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!"

That wicked laughter, that red ponytail and ominous aura. There was only one person that matched that description. Evil Vicky, Icky with a V.

Said evil babysitter's laughter died down though when she saw no signs of the twerp, all she saw was a stranger she'd never seen before. A very good looking stranger.

"And who might you be?" She asked getting up in his personal space.

Timmy was as equal parts confused as he was scared. The last time Vicky was all over him like this was when he was Gah the norwegen male supermodel. Surprisingly enough though the fear wasn't as prevalent as was the confusion. Why wasn't he as scared of her as he used to be? Weird. But he still needed to give an answer.

"I'm uh, Tim... Tim Turner. I'm the twerps cousin from... Retroville." he answered.

"Never heard of it." Vicky said plainly but not missing how Tim referred to Timmy as twerp. "Anyway where is the twerp?"

"His parents changed there mind and took him with them." he said without missing a beat. When did lying become so easy?

"Oh. Okay. That means it's just you and me then." Vicky smiled as she leaned closer.

Timmy gulped. This was so weird.

There was no way Timmy was just going to stand there while Vicky went nuts over his older self again. He only had one option left... RUN!!! Before Vicky could try anything else, Timmy quickly made a sprint for the front door, hoping that once he got free into town, he could escape. Unfortunately, just before he could reach for the knob, he felt something at his ankle causing him to trip and fall.

Looking back, he saw Vicky had already caught up and held his leg in a grip like a vice. He tried to pull himself free, but she was surprisingly strong. "Not this time. I've had one too many hunks try to run out on me like that. I'm not gonna let that happen to you, even if you're the twerp's cousin." She says as she begins to pull him back towards her.

Not good. If Vicky got her hands on him like this, he was doomed. Yet, part of him felt okay with that. What was going on with his head?

He only had one chance to get free and figure out what's going on with him. Pulling out the remote, he made a plan to either age himself up to the point where he could break free, or de-age himself younger so he can slip free of her grasp. Either option seemed better than letting Vicky do whatever she had planned for him.

Looking back over his shoulder, he saw that Vicky already had her hands pulling his torso back towards her. With no time to properly set things, Timmy aimed the remote back towards himself and fired again.

What happened?

112231221.content:
"Come back here, twerp!" cried Vicky. But Timmy had successfully scuttled away to A.J.'s. Scanning the streets around her, Vicky could not see where he had gone.

All she could see were houses. Tiny houses filled with tiny people who were all at her mercy...

"Forget about Timmy," thought Vicky, with a wicked grin. "Time to have some fun with my new size."

She pried off the roof of the house next to the Turners'--the Dinklebergs'. The Dinklebergs were sitting in their living room, and were frozen with shock at the sight of the garagantuan girl's face looming over them.

"Hi, Timmy's neighbors!" she said. Then, she squashed them flat with her hand. "Bye, Timmy's neighbors!"

Vicky smashed her way through the surrounding houses: stomping some, kicking some into the distance like they were soccer balls, and (her favorite) crushing some beneath her colossal ass by sitting on them.

By now, some of the inhabitants had gotten wind of the fact that a giantess was destroying everyone and everything in the vicinity. They poured out of their houses to flee her--some in cars and some on foot. Vicky lay in the street blocking them, beating them with her fists, flicking them into houses, where their bones shattered.

Vicky was relishing her devastating power. She wanted to do more, though. Then she felt her tummy rumble.

"Ooh," she said. "I wonder what you tiny twerps taste like."

She lifted a house off of its foundations, ripped off its roof, and shook the people into her mouth.

"Mmm, salty!" she said. The taste reminded her of Cheese Pants, one of her favorite snacks. "Guess I know where you guys are going."

The greedy teenager worked her way through a row of six houses, scarfing down family after family. Content with her snack, Vicky found a nice cul-de-sac to plant her butt in, sat down on four houses, and emitted a thunderous burp.

"Man," she said. "This is the best day ever." She looked around her. She must have demolished about thirty houses. "But I'm just getting started. Time to scale this up."

What did she have planned?

choices: They are seen by Nigel & Marianne!
1123333222.content:
Within a thick jungle in central Peru... The Thornberrys are currently exploring an ancient, temple ruin. It’s walls are covered in moss and overgrown vegetation. Nigel, the current leader of the expedition scoffs as he plods through a broken section of wall.

“Pah! I’m a nature documentarian. I’m not here for dungeon diving or artefact nabbing!” He takes his wife, Marianne by the hand and leads her out of the ruins.

However, their daughters, Eliza and Debbie are lagging behind. Eliza pokes and prods the walls trying to understand the carvings. As she’s engrossed in the markings, Debbie creeps behind her...

Just as she makes it to her the flooring gives way! Sending the sisters to tumble down a cavernous mudslide. Finally landing at the bottom a strange light is cast on Debbie’s face, waking her up. She stands limply and moves towards the source of the light, a pendant. It lays on a mossy pedestal yet the pendant is unchanged. The strange light illuminated from a green jewel which has been carved into the face of the strange object. With an outreached hand... Debbie grasps the object, her eyes turn white, her mouth hangs low as her voice groans like a rusted cog in an ancient machine.

From behind, Eliza struggles to her feet, her face is red with anger as she shouts into the cavernous space, “What the hell Debbie?! I was just in the middle of figuring out what those runes meant! It could’ve been something important!”

Debbie gives no reaction as her back remains turned... whatever was left in her mind has now been silenced. ‘Debbie’ grips the pendent tightly as her hands slowly grow... A smirk grows on her face as she speaks in a tired, groaned voice... “What did they say Eliza? Was it anything important? Or is it as useless as the speck you are?”

Eliza is taken aback, something is wrong... Debbie is growing alarmingly as she reaches 20ft. Her teenage form towers above. Eliza wants to run... Has to run... But she can’t, frozen in fear at this great power that looms above her...

Debbie has continued to grow... Her form amasses to well above 50ft by now as she crashes through the stone ceiling. With a deep roar of laughter, her bright green eyes are cast upon the minuscule form of Eliza. She soon develops a toothy grin as her gigantic hand reaches down to pluck Eliza. With just a thumb and forefinger, the hapless sister is lifted into the air and dumped into the awaiting palm of the giantess...

“I have you at my mercy! So You’re going to have to please your new Goddess by...”
1123333222.title: The Legend of the Giantess Shrine (Debby Grows!)
