1211111212.content:
Justin was working tirelessly in the wizard lair perfecting his new spell. Lately Alex had been a lot more mouthy than usual when he was left in charge of the house, so this new spell of his would help straighten her out. He was so engrossed in his work that he failed to notice he was no longer alone.


Alex just stood there off to the side watching her "little" brother fiddle with liquids and beakers. Clearly he was in what he called ''the zone'' as he hadn't even registered her presence. Typical Justin. He really needed to pay closer attention to his surroundings. What would he have done if she was a regular human who spotted him using true magic?


Oh well, that wasn't the case and she needed to let her brother know there was a new sheriff in town. She was about to call out to him but then paused. He still hadn't noticed her yet and that brought with it some interesting scenarios. She could just introduce the new her as she intended... or she could scare him first.


Both options sounded good honesly. Just imagining his face as her older self took charge or scared him stiff was too good a visual. Alex placed a hand to her chin in thought as Justin began stirring his chemicals. What would it be? A serious introduction or a jump-scare?

"Hmm?"
1211111212.title: Justin needs to pay attention

choices: The smoke makes Alex even older
12111112122.content:
Her more childish side seemed to win out. Jump scare it would be. Oh she couldn't wait to see the look on Justin's face when he saw this mysterious stranger catch him off guard. Clearing her throat silently, Alex got ready to scare her brother senseless.


She crept up next to him as quietly as could be.... And yelled at the top of her lungs, "HEY JUSTIN!!!"


The reaction was instantaneous, the boy shrieked as if he'd been burned. The chemical compound he was working on found itself flying up into the air and Justin found himself leaning against the table with wide eyes, his heart hammering in his chest.


"WHO ARE YOU!!!" he screamed in shock.


Alex couldn't help but giggle. Seeing the cool, calm, and collected Justin freak out was totally worth any consequences that might follow. But then again. she was never someone who truly worried about the repercussions of her actions.


"Wouldn't you like to know?" Alex teased.


Unfortunately for the pair they stopped paying attention to the chemical compound Justin had thrown into the air. It came crashing down hard to the floor and shattered on impact. The unstable mixture began to turn into smoke that engulfed the room.


The two began coughing and the only words Justin could get out were a frightened... "Oh no."
12111112122.title: Scared You

"I am Alex Little Brother hahahahaha!"

Justin's eyes went wide. This intruder was Alex? It couldn't be. But upon closer inspection the similarities where there. "Impossible." he whispered. "Alex?"

"The one and only." The older woman confirmed.

"It couldn't be, unless... You used some sort of age spell didn't you!?" Justin accused.

Alex simply rolled her eyes. "Maybe I did, maybe I didn't?"

"You so did!" He accused. "I am so telling mom and dad!"

The short boy tried to walk past his older and taller sister but was quickly cut of by her, "And just where do you think you're going?"

Justin scowled. "Where do you think? To rat you out."

Alex smirked. "I don't think you will."

"And why's that?" Justin asked.

Alex never lost her smirk.

12111112122212.content:
Justin continued to stand idly by as Alex suddenly whipped out her phone. The action seemed to puzzle the smaller boy, who on earth could Alex be calling at this time of the day?

Alex could tell just by looking at her brother that he was wondering who she could be calling. He could be real dense at times. The answer should have been obvious. Even Max could've figured this out.

"Hello?" A voice answered on the other end of the line.

"Hey Harper, it's Alex. Wanna hang out?"

Justin's face went pale. Harper!? Alex went and called Harper!? God he felt like an idiot. Of course she would call Harper. She was the only friend she had that knew about her magical side.

And she also had schoolgirl crush on him.

"Alex, don't--"

"You'll be over soon." Alex said aloud just to taunt her brother. "Great. Oh, and Justin will be here too."

"Alex!" Justin tried to reach for the phone but was held back by her outstretched arm.

"Cool. See you soon." Alex finished before hanging up. "Harper will be here in a few. If I were you, I'd prepare myself."

"You monster." Justin ground out. This was bad. He needed to find a way to get back to normal.

"Monster?" Alex repeated. "Sounds good to me."

1211111212221221.content:
"OMG Yes! Attack of the fifty-foot Alex and Harper!" Harper smiled. The idea of joining her best friend as an older powerful giant with little Justin tagging along for the ride sounded like a dream come true.

Alex smiled at her friends acceptance of her plan, as well as her overall enthusiasm. "I knew you'd love it. Now hold still while I prep the age spell." Alex ordered.

"No!" Justin practically shrieked. "This is a terrible idea! Have you both gone insane!? Magic is supposed to be kept secret from normal humans... Harper notwithstanding. If you do this you'll expose magic to the world."

Alex and Harper actually thought over Justin's words. He raised a pretty fair point. If they did do this the existence of magic and wizards would be exposed. But on the other hand it would be fun and they'd be unstoppable.

Alex weighed her options...

Harper weighted options...

In the end they both agreed, "Who cares!"

Alex began her chant as her 'little' brother tried desperately to stop her. Needless to say he was rather ineffective at stopping her.

Before he knew it the chant was finished and the spell was complete. All Justin could do was watch in horror and a slight bit of awe as Harper's form began to change. Her hips widened, her chest extended, her height increased, her face became more heart shaped and her hair flowed free.

Justin's eyes went wide as saucers at the older Harper. He would dare call her cute, except for one teeny tiny detail, the spell that would follow next.

Harper looked herself over before running to the nearest mirror. She almost didn't recognize herself, but she liked what she saw. "I look good!"

"Yeah, you do." Alex agreed. Harper looked a lot better than she was expecting. "Now are you ready for the second part?"

"Oh yeah!" Harper nodded.

"No! She's not!" Justin cut in. He then turned to Harper. "You're an adult now, that means you're supposed to be responsible. Tell her you're not ready or willing to go along with this."

"Sorry Justin." Harper giggled. "But I want to be Godzilla for a day.

Justin felt his heart drop, much to Alex amusement.

She prepped the next spell, "Here we go!"

"NOOO!!!" Justin cried.

Suddenly his vision went white as the room was engulfed in a blinding white glow. It was so bright Justin was forced to shut his eyes lest he go blind.

He forced his eyes to remain shut as he heard the telltale sounds of what sounded like wood and concrete breaking apart. Whatever was happening right this very second he really didn't want to know.

"YOU CAN OPEN YOU'RE EYES NOW LITTLE MAN!" came a booming voice from above.

"STOP COWERING SO YOU CAN GET A LOOK AT THE NEW US'S ALREADY!" another voice chimed in.

Justin did just that and slowly opened his eyes. What he saw left him near speechless. The house was gone, reduced to nothing but rubble. Max! Oh he sure hoped Max wasn't still in the house!

It was then he finally looked up. High in the sky where to faces he was quickly becoming familiar with... Alex and Harper. Only this time their face were as big as jumbo-trons. They were huge! Their whole bodies were! Justin tried to force out words and the only thing to come out was air.

This was not good.
1211111212221221.title: "Attack of the 50 foot Alex and Harper"

12111112122212212.content:
"WOW, ALEX. LOOK AT HIM. HE'S SPEECHLESS!" Harper giggled as she watched 'little' Justin try and fail to make words.

"I KNOW, RIGHT. WHAT'S WRONG JUSTIN? CAT GOT YOUR TONGUE?" Alex teased. There was just something oh so satisfying about messing with Justin. He just had the kind of face that could morph like putty.

Harper then turned her attention from Justin and to her newly expanded form. "WOW. I REALLY AM BIG AREN'T I?" she questioned. She must've been at least 50ft in height, she could literally see over most of the houses in the neighborhood.

"DAMN RIGHT YOU ARE. THE TWO OF US ARE THE BIGGEST HUMANS WALKING THE FACE OF THE EARTH." Alex elaborated.

Justin meanwhile was trying to figure out his next course of action. His brain had finally settled and given way to survival of the fittest. As it stood, compared to the giants he was at the bottom of the food chain.

Perhaps he should make a break for it while the giants were distracted. Now was certainly a good time. But realistically how far would he really get at his size? All they'd have to do is bend down and pluck him up.

That was a terrifying thought. To be plucked from the ground by a giant pair of fingers and hoisted up high into the sky like an ant.

He suddenly felt pity for all of the bugs of the world.

"HEY ALEX? HOW TALL ARE WE EXACTLY?" Harper asked.

"50FT. CLASSIC GIANT SIZE." Alex answered. "WHY?"

"I WAS JUST WONDERING IF IT WAS POSSIBLE TO BE BIGGER?"

Alex perked up. "BIGGER!?"

"BIGGER!" Harper grinned.

"Smaller!?" Justin panicked.

Both giant's eyed him closely. "Nah!"
12111112122212212.title: Is 50ft enough?

121111121222122121.content:
Justin could only watch in horror as his worst fears became a reality. The giants that once stood tall at 50ft where now growing right before his very eyes. This was bad. Very, very, very, freaking bad! Why couldn't 50ft have been enough?

The answer: because why the heck not. There was no real reason behind wanting to be bigger other than the simple fact that they could. And if Alex could grow them both at will, then the city and by extension him, are monumentally screwed.

"OH WOW!" Harper commented. "JUST HOW BIG ARE WE GONNA GET ALEX!?"

"100ft SOUNDED GOOD IN MY HEAD, SO I ADDED 50 MORE FEET!" Alex answered.

"COOL!" Harper smiled.

Justin felt like he was going to be sick. From 50ft to 100ft? Before he even realized it he was off and running. To heck with trying to reason with the pair, he wanted... no, needed to get the heck out of here. He needed to find either his mom or dad and get them to put a stop to this.

"Crap! Crap! Crap! Crap! Crap!" Justin repeated like a mantra.

While he continued to sprint away, the giant's growth had finally ceased. The world around them seemed even smaller than ever before. "SO THIS IS WHAT IT FEELS LIKE TO BE 100ft TALL? I LIKE THIS!" Harper grinned.

"DITTO!" Alex agreed. 100ft of height felt just perfect for her. "SO WHAT DO YOU WANT TO DO NOW!?"

Harper raised an eyebrow.

Soon Zuri found Jessie in her room, work on her resume for another acting gig coming up.

Zuri quietly activated the ray gun and set it to ‘Swap’ as she blasted herself and Jessie as the two started to change.

Zuri found herself growing taller and her body developing as she started to grow up, even her clothes were now tighter as she grew

While Zuri was growing, the opposite was happening to Jessie as she was starting to panic as she was shrinking and her clothes were starting to become very loose on her.

Soon the effects of the ray gun finished, leaving Zuri as an young athletic young woman with a body of a young model is tattered children’s clothes and Jessie a little kid in loose adult clothes. Zuri laughed at how great the results were and it also got Jessie’s attention as she was shocked to see who had done this to her

“Zuri, what did you do to us?” Jessie asked in a high pitch voice

“Sorry Jessie, but I figured that one you can get some R&R and I get back at Emma,” explained Zuri who had a more mature voice

“Wait get back Emma for what?” asked Jessie who was still having some trouble understanding what was going on.

“I figure it was time for Emma to get some payback for her teasing and picking on me, and I know you would like to get back at her too, so are you with me or not?” Zuri started.

"Come on Emma. We both no there's no way I'm going to be able to keep that massive thumb of yours down for a three count." Jessie complained. It was true. The older woman's thumb completely eclipsed her own.

"Do you want me back to normal or not?" Emma asked irritably.

"Yes!" Jessie whined.

"Then you have no choice." Emma smiled as she wiggled her superior thumb.

Jessie sighed in resignation. She wasn't paid enough for this. "Fine. But since your thumbs' bigger than mine I'm allowed to use my whole body."

"That's fine. It's not like it'll help." Emma taunted.

"Oh you are so going down." Jessie fumed. She would not be talked down to.

The now taller woman smirked when Jessie took the bait. "Whatever you say little girl."

Jessie growled as the two faced each, body against thumb. It was long and fierce battle, or at least that's what Jessie would've liked to believe. The reality was the fight only lasted about five seconds as Emma easily dominated Jessie for a three count.

Jessie waited in anticipation, ignoring the large commotion down at her feet. Needless to say a giant nanny is not what any passerby’s were expecting. Luckily they didn’t ruin her fun and kept driving. Knowing better than getting in the way of Jessie. She saw everything, seeing them so small as she really enjoyed it. Everything was so small, well more accurately she was so big.

“Jessie!” A voice said from the balcony, quickly turning her head and looking down to see the first child Zuri. The girl being amazed and shocked. “Y-You’re so big!”

Jessie smirked to herself. Not only is this the girl’s first time seeing someone so big, it was the first time she saw someone so small. She was enjoying this of course, cause how could she not. Due to her size, her face and her neck was all Zuri could see. That didn’t stop the girl from going to the ledge and looking down.

“You are so big!” She said as Zuri was amazed. “H-How?”

“I’ll explain that when they are all here.” Jessie said smiling at the girl, only to shift her eyes again to see. “Hello there Luke.”

The boy was just standing there, shocked and amazed seeing the giant nanny in all her glory. He could not utter a word for a long time, was just amazed.

“Luke it’s Jessie. She’s huge!”

“I-I can tell!” He said before doing what Zuri did and look over the edge. Glancing right down to see the rest of her body. Jessie felt like a real attraction due to this, and she smiled. Although the longer he looked, the more she understood what he was looking at. Other wise, her pair was big and in view. With a smirk of her own, she swept her finger up the building and getting close to Luke. The boy jumped back very afraid as she gave out a loud laugh, finding it funny.

“Jessie?” The last and oldest child said, as Emma looked right at her. Very surprised at what she was seeing. She came right up to her sister as she was more than amazed. “How are you so big?”

Jessie smiled to herself as she lifted up the gun, which thankfully grew to her size as well. It was like a large contraptions to the three children.

“This grew me, and I know it can do so much more than that. Pretty awesome right!”

“Totally!” Luke said as he was looking at his giant crush... giant.

“Can you grow me too! Please!” Zuri said very happy about this. “I want to feel the cars under my feet.”

“Hehe, Maybe Zuri. If you are a good girl.”

“Okay, but why?” Emma questioned with her arms crossed. Jessie smirked right at them before answering.

“Cause, if i’m being honest. I’m sick of the way you three treat me. I might be your nanny, but I am older than you and a normal person. Now, you three have to listen to me. Or else.”

Suddenly, an aura of authority arrived in her voice. One that left the three more aware of the danger.

“Now, as your new much larger nanny. Get on my hand.” Jessie said, shifting her free hands around and bringing it down onto the balcony. Crushing it down as it broke many things there. She looked at it for a second, and then to the children. “Don’t worry, it’s safe. As long as I choose it to be safe.” She said loving the authority she had right now.

They listened, all three of them making their way over and stepping on. She could feel the small steps and the small kids climb on it as she loved it.

With a smile she brought her hand up, all three of the kids bracing for movement. Taking a couple of steps back, she had the kids over nothing now. If it was not her hand, they would fall right to the ground.

Jessie brought her close to her ample chest, letting them see her pair. Luke of course being the most happy to get this view.

For once, Jessie didn’t mind that much. At this size, of course she was going to get views from all three.

“Jessie, whatever you do, don’t drop us!” Emma said stubbornly, not wanting to fall.

“Relax you three are fine. Now Emma, you mind telling me how I look?”

“H-How you look?”

“Come on, you always go about fashion, now tell me.” She said, but only something she noticed. Behind Emma, Jessie’s fingers curled almost telling her.

“I... well you look very good, clothes are... great.” She said back getting her grips together. She did not want to annoy her, or get her to drop.

“Good girl.” Jessie smiling, seeing how well in line she was. Glancing right down to her feet, she could see all the cars around her, as she made sure not to step on them. She does not want to arrises any trouble, she just wants to have fun. “Now, what to do? What to do? Hm... you three got ideas?”

They were a bit taken aback by the fact that they got a choice, but of course they spoke up.

“You could come down,” Emma said. “Before you step on anything.” She said not liking her so big, cause why would she?

Luke on the other hand, was more than happy about her size. “Can you put us somewhere on your body! That would be fun.” He said clearly wanting her big. Jessie smiled her big smile at her and melted him.

“Can you grow me big too! I want to be giant in the city as well!” Zuri said as she obviously wanted to be big. All three of them all had good ideas and... well instead of Emma.

After thinking for a little while, she smiled and looked down at the three.

“Okay, I know what I want to do. I am going with __________” Jessie said.

“Emma! Please don’t hurt me!” She said as admittedly, she didn’t have any plan to do that. She was just going to mess with her, as she laughed.

“Oh Jessie, you are so pathetic. I won’t kill you, I got better plans for you. For now though, you have to stay where I put you.

“Put me down!” She said, kicking her feet around and trying to escape. She rolled her eyes right now as she brought Jessie down. She could not understand what was happening, as she then dragged her right down to her chest. Pushing her right between her tits and into her cleavage. Pushing with so much happiness about it as she was stuck in.

Jessie was so afraid about it, as she kept her mouth shut and did not comment about it one bit. Keeping calm as Emma smiled. Moving her finger and pushing down onto her as she pets her.

“Good girl. Now, let’s go have fun shall we. After all, at this size with this gun, I can pretty much do anything I want. Literally anything, hehe.”

She wanted to have fun at this size right now, and with a smile she plans to go and have some fun.

1212311111131.content:
Despite Emma's pinky promise, Jessie knew she couldn't trust her word. The eldest Ross child had proclaimed herself a goddess earlier, there was no way she'd ever willingly give up her newfound power.

Jessie silently berated herself for leaving the gun unattended. If only she had the hindsight to hide it somewhere or just not listen to Emma at all and remain a giant. At least then she'd still be in control.

Oh well, there was no use in dwelling on the past. Whatever happened happened, and now it was up to her to cur Emma down to size before someone (mainly her) got hurt. But what was the best way to do that?

Jessie knew the only way to shrink Emma back down to size was the gun and she was keeping it close. It changed size with the user so it stands to reason if Jessie touched it while Emma wasn't it would shrink to match her. If that happened then she could turn that spoiled brat back to normal. Or she could just re-grow herself. Either option sounded good honestly. She just couldn't fail, failure meant certain death.

The nanny shuddered at the mere thought of Emma's massive foot coming down on her, or her fingers pressing against her like a zit, or even... or even getting a scenic tour of the giantess stomach. So many ways Emma could eliminate her if she really wanted to.

No! No! No! Jessie couldn't think like that. This was bigger than her (No pun intended). The reward far outweighed the risk. She needed to get that gun back and teach the brat what happens when you cross the line. She'd get that gun back even if it killed her.

Now what to do? The games sounded good, but then again she'd be at a severe disadvantage. Just how was she supposed to beat Emma's massive thumb anyway? Her own pinky didn't even measure up to the girl's pinky, so there was no way she'd be able to keep her thumb down for a three count. And even if she did somehow manage to win... Fe Fi Fo Fum would guarantee her death. There was no way she'd be able to outrun Emma at her size. Plus game three was still a mystery.

Zuri was a complete wildcard. They were on more or less good terms, but if power could corrupt Emma like it did then what were the odds it wouldn't corrupt the youngest of the Ross siblings just as quickly? Zuri was just too much of an unknown.

What did that leave her with? Options B and C were out so that just option A. "Crap." Jessie cursed. The last place she wanted to be was anywhere near Emma's hands and feet, and yet at was her best chance to get the ray back. To save herself and potentially the world, she would have to brave the giantess' feet. Who in the world did she piss off?

Like it or not this was her best bet. Worse case scenario she just winds up crushed, right? Jessie took a deep breath, with no other viable options left she gazed up to meet the giantess, "Ok Emma, I choose option one. I'll give you your manicure and pedicure."

''Really?" Emma asked almost excitedly. She half expected Jessie to try and get her to shink by choosing option B. Granted she never planned to keep her word, but still, she wasn't going to complain. If Jessie chose to service her like a good servant then she wouldn't complain. "A wise decision."

Emma then proceeded to take a seat, her enormous rear creating another earthquake-like tremor that knocked Jessie off her feet. She was getting pretty sick of tasting the ground, though she kept that to herself and just dusted herself off. She had a job to do and if she did it right, all this would become a bad memory.

Jessie turned her attention to the now seated giantess and paled when she saw how close the blonde's feet were to her body. If she messed this up then she could wind up under them. That was a fate she would like to avoid. "So..." the nanny began. "Do you have any files or polish on you?"

"Nope." Emma smirked.

Damn brat.

"Then how do you expect me to get this done?" Jessie asked. A few seconds in and already things weren't going well.

"You're my nanny, not the other way around. Figure it out." Emma explained. "And be quick about it, I get bored real easy."

Jessie groaned into her hands. This was not going well. Just how was she supposed to get this done?

121231111113111.content:
"Alright Emma, well play your games." Jessie conceded. She really didn't want to do this, but she couldn't complete the mani-pedi was no supplies. That also meant that if she wanted even the smallest chance at getting the ray back, she would have to endure Emma's new size.

"Excellent choice. At least this way you might actually get me to shrink down." Emma teased. She had no real intention of ever shrinking back down even if Jessie did somehow pull off a miracle; not that she would. But she could at least let the tiny girl hope.

Jessie nodded. She was trying to stay calm on the outside, but on the inside she was nervous as can be. If she remembered the games correctly it was thumb wrestling first, followed by fe fi fo fum, and game three was a mystery unless it was needed.

Crap! There was no way she could keep Emma's thumb down for a three count. Her thumb alone could probably bench more than her. How could she even attempt to pick up a win here? Perhaps...

"Emma?!" Jessie called.

"Yeah?"

"For thumb wrestling am I allowed to use my whole body since your thumb's bigger than mine?" The nanny asked. She prayed Emma would say yes.

That was a good question. Should she allow Jessie to use her whole body? It would certainly make things more interesting. Plus there would be the added bonus of literally having Jessie under her thumb when she won. Emma smiled, "Fine. In the spirit of fairness you can use your whole body."

Jessie felt the weight leaving her shoulders. She might have a chance now. "Thank you, Emma!"

Emma smirked. "Don't thank me yet, you're still in for a world of hurt."

Jessie started to sweat.

Emma put her thumb down.

"Game... Start."
121231111113111.title: Let The Games Begin

1212311111131112.content:
"Game... Start."

Jessie nervously looked up at the giant thumb that awaited her atop Emma's fist. This was it, the start of the games. If she won she would be one step closer to shrinking the giant teen. Or at the very least getting the ray gun back.

"Keep your cool, Jessie. You can do this." She told herself. Slowly she began to climb the giant fist, using the fingers as a sort of makeshift ladder. Emma giggled at the contact and watching the tiny woman struggle to meet her limb.

Eventually Jessie reached the top and took a deep breath. She still could not believe how small she was compared Emma. She really should've kept the size ray and stayed a giant. She then looked up at the large limb and paled.

Emma's thumb towered over her. It just wasn't fair. How can Emma's thumb be bigger than her? Someone somewhere in the universe must really have it out for her. Despite her fear she had to do this. She had to endure this trial.

Jessie had to remind herself that winning wasn't her true objective here. Her mission was to get ahold of the ray when Emma let her guard down. Right now the enormous blonde was keeping it in her other hand far away from her.

If Emma suspected her true intentions, then she didn't show it. Right now she just thinks that she's invincible and can't be bested. That was good. Jessie could work with that. Emma's ego would cost her everything.

Jessie took another deep breath to steady her heart. It was now or never. She raised her arms up high and gripped the limb. Mentally she wanted to scream, she couldn't even completely wrap her arm around it. "I'm ready Emma!"

The giantess' grin turned feral. "Good! Noe try to take me down."

The nanny did just that as she strained her muscles to move Emma's thumb. Try as she may the thumb wouldn't move. All Emma did was yawn to convey how little a threat Jessie posed.

After another few minutes of watching her tiny nanny fail, Emma decided to put the older woman out of her misery. "Game... Over!"

She brought her thumb down, and Jessie felt the air leave her lungs. She was flat on her back with the huge weight of Emma pressing down on her.

"1... 2... 3...!" Emma cheered. "Here's is your winner and still the undefeated thumb wrestling champion... EMMA ROSS!"
1212311111131112.title: Thumb Wrestling Champion

12123111111311121.content:
Jessie groaned as Emma released her from her grip. The mad titan's strength was unreal. Jessie knew she stood little chance of winning, but she never expected Emma to dominate her like that. It just put into perspective how Emma could dispose of her whenever she chose.

It was still a terrifying thought.

"Well Jessie, it looks like I win round one." Emma teased. "Now that means you have to win round two now. If not then your dead meat... literally."

Jessie paled at hearing that. The next game was fe fi fo fum. She had to avoid getting crushed by Emma for a set amount of time in order to win. There was no way she'd ever be able to go for the ray in this game. That meant she would have to pull off some sort of miracle and pray game three offered her the opportunity.

Jessie slowly climbed down Emma's hand before the giant stood to her full height. There was no way to outrun Emma. She needed to find a way to survive. "The next game is fe fi fo fum, right?!"

"That's right?" Emma confirmed.

"Alright! What are the rules?"

"You have to avoid getting crushed by me for exactly one hour. You're allowed to go anywhere and do anything to avoid me. And just to be fair, I'll even give you a twenty second head start." the giantess explained. "Unless of course you want to have an even match and we start at the same time..."

"No! No!" Jessie said frantically. "Thank you for your generosity! I'll gladly take that twenty second head start!"

Emma rolled her eyes. "Thought so. Now get a move on! You're twenty seconds just started."

Jessie paled and took off like a bat out of hell!

"I love it when they run." Emma joked to herself.

----

"Gotta hide! Gotta hide!" Jessie repeated as she ran through the city Emma carelessly stepped through. Cars and people fearfully littered the streets and took pictures of the giant footprints and carnage Emma Ross left in her wake.

Jessie didn't care about any of that though. All she cared about was reaching the Ross home and taking shelter there. It was probably the only place in the entire city Emma wouldn't destroy.

Suddenly there was a large boom. And another. And soon after there was a pattern. Everyone in the city felt it and craned their heads up to see the blonde menace return to their fair city. "FE FI FO FUM! I HAVE COME FOR YOU JESSIE PRESCOTT!"

Jessie's eyebrows rose into her head in fear of the enormous blonde. "Oh no!"

"ROUND TWO... START!"
12123111111311121.title: Fe Fi Fo Fum

121231111113111212.content:
Jessie knew if Emma got her hands on her it was all over. Thinking quickly she ran into a nearby ally and jumped into a large dumpster. Jessie immediately regretted her decision as this was the seafood shack's dumpster. It smelled like leftover sushi and dipping sauce.

The disgusted nanny plugged her nose. "If I survive this, I am so taking a shower!"

Meanwhile on the outside Emma began her search for the average woman. So far she didn't see her in this crowed. Perhaps she was hiding in one of the nearby buildings? The first one that caught her attention was the seafood shack. She hated that place with a passion. What kind of seafood place didn't serve shrimp?! Not only that, they didn't deliver!

Emma scowled at the small establishment and slowly lifted her foot over it. All the tinies below began to scramble as it didn't take a genius to figure out what would happen next.

Everyone down below got a good view of the underside of the blonde's enormous foot and they could literally see all the wrinkles dirt and debris falling that clung to it. The seafood shack was engulfed in shadow... and the giantess brought her foot down.

The establishment disappeared under her sole and the shockwave sent anyone and anything close by flying. Jessie didn't know what was happening out there, all she did know was that she felt weightless as her hiding spot soared through the air. She landed with hard crash and if it weren't for the bags of squishy fish remains she was sure she would've broken something.

Emma on the other hand groaned in contentment as she felt the building reduce to rubble under her foot. It offered no resistance in the face of her overwhelming power. There was no chance in hell she was ever shrinking back down.

She slowly removed her foot and smiled at the remains left in her footfall's wake. Nothing and no one could stop her, and once she found Jessie she would finish this little game and turn her attention to the rest of the world.

"Ready or not Jessie, here I come."

----------------------
One Hour Later
----------------------

12131111.content:
Miley was beyond excited. Rico had really come through for her, although she did remain anonymous. He didn't need to know who she was when ordering a special product. A product that he would mostly likely keep for himself if he knew what it did.

Good thing he didn't.

The Age-Transformer. A little device that sounded like it was ripped straight from one of her little brother's comic books. At first she didn't believe it was real, but then she saw the name of the person who built it. That was more than enough to convince her.

All Miley wanted was to get her alternate persona, Hanna Montana, into the international music festival. The only thing stopping her was the fact that it was eighteen and up. Now she wouldn't have to worry about that. She would be able to enter legally.

Miley smiled as she sat in her room pealing away the cardboard and plastic that incased her new device. Once that was done she marveled in awe at the device.

It was so tiny.

It was as big as a flip phone. In fact it kind of looked like a flip phone. A small silver flip phone. The reveal was pretty shocking. If it wasn't for the name of the creator she would've assumed she'd been ripped off.

Thankfully the Age-Transformer came with instructions. All she had to do was type a number into the phone and press the green 'call' looking button. Apparently some sort of laser would fire from the phone's antenna. There was also a cool down period between uses.

Simple enough.

Miley smiled contently as she looked herself over in the mirror next to her bed. She was all decked out in her Hanna Montana gear, blonde wig and all. She looked down at the device in her hand and flipped it open to see it was fully charged. She could do this. All she had to do was type an age and fire.

Miley took a deep breath and typed twenty-one on the dial pad. All she had to do was fire. She aimed the phone-like device at herself... And pressed the green button.

1213111111.content:
"And just where do you think you're going?" Miley asked as she cut off his escape. Jackson was slightly annoyed by this and was about to comment until he noticed something was off.

That was when a slight gasp escaped his lips. Did Miley get taller? He wasn't looking down at her anymore. He was looking up at her instead. "Did you get taller?"

"Maybe?" Miley smiled. She suddenly struck a pose. "Do you notice anything else?"

Now that he thought about it, she did look slightly different. Outside of the few inches she gained, she looked more shapely than before. Not that he was ever looking at her in that way. He was just now noticing, that's all.

"Uh...?" was Jackson's oh so brilliant reply. This was just far to awkward for him. It was clear to him now what seemed different about his sister. The wider hips, larger chest, and more mature look in her eyes. She had a new air of mature beauty about her.

But he couldn't tell her that.

Miley was absolutely ecstatic at Jackson's dumb reply. He obviously noticed the changes but because of their relationship wasn't sure if he should say. Messing with him was more fun than she thought. She leaned closer and lowered herself just enough that he could slightly see under her shirt.

"Do you like what you see?" Miley teased.

Jackson felt himself begin to sweat. He wanted to vigorously nod his head but mentally slapped himself for even wanting to. Even if Miley all of a sudden looked hot. Why was she even teasing him like this? If he said no to her question then he's a lier and if he said yes he's a perv.

He just couldn't win.

"It's okay you don't have to answer." Miley smiled. Jackson felt relieve wash over him... Until Miley spoke again. "I can already tell you like what you see."

Jackson was confused by this before he felt a bizarre tightness in his pants. He looked down and saw he was pitching a tent. He felt his eyes widen in embarrassment and shame, how could his own body betray him like this?

"Well Jackson, since I know how much your reputation means to you, you'd never want this kind of information to get out. Imagine what other people would say if they found out you liked me like that." She finished by pointing to his boner.

For shame on him. For shame.

"Alright Miley, what do you want?" Jackson sighed in defeat.

Miley smiled. "You've always been older and stronger and the one in charge. Now I'm the one who's in charge. Got it."

Jackson nodded.

"Good." Miley clapped. "Now onto the first order of business."

12131111111.title: Make Jackson give her a massage

121311111112.content:
Rule One: No more casual clothing. Things like shirts and shorts had to go. Button down suits and tuxedoes only.

Rule Two: Miley's word is law. When she gives an order it's to be fallowed with a smile.

Rule Three: Comic books are band. No more heroes running around in colored undies.

Rule Four: Miley reserves the right to change the rules at any time.

Jackson was appalled by the ground rules his sister lied down. Rule one was designed purposefully with the intent to make him uncomfortable. He hated suits. Especially with their damn ties. Just how was he supposed to put one on without strangling himself?

Rule two was created with goal being to make him know his place. He couldn't go against Miley's orders when she had all the leverage and she wanted him to serve her with a smile on his face like a good whipping boy. Un-freaking-believable!

Rule three was just cruelty for cruelty's sake. Miley knew her brother loved comics and wanted to make him suffer by taking one of his true loves away. She had no real reason to do so other than to show off her new level of authority over him. It made him want to vomit.

And finally there was rule four. Like a wild card in a game of UNO it changed everything. Miley could do whatever she wanted to him and he couldn't do a thing to stop her. Rule one today could be something completely different by tomorrow.

It was just so... Unfair.

"Why? Why are you doing this?"

"Because I can. Now let's get this massage going already." Miley said impatiently.

Jackson sighed. Knowing their was nothing he could do he put on his best fake smile and began the massage. Just what had his life become?

12131111111211.content:
Miley's fun was short lived as a knock at the door spoiled her remaining plans. Oh well, it probably for the best as she still had a music festival to attend. She left Jackson be for the time-being and opened the door to reveal her bestie Lily, already dressed in her Lola attire.

"Hey there Lilly -- Oh, I mean... Lola."

"Hey there Miley! How's -- Wait. Did you get taller all of a sudden?" Lily asked. That was strange. She could've sworn Miley wasn't THAT tall. Did she have one of those growth spurts recently?

"Maybe?" Miley replied. She began to smile when she saw the confusion etched onto her best friend's face. That smile only grew when her eyes widened as she looked her up and down and her eyes settled on her chest.

3...

2...

1...

0...

"OH MY GOSH! You're chest is huge!" Lily shouted. That got a slight giggle from Miley and even a small one from Jackson who was off in the background. "Oh hey Jackson! Didn't see you there! But Miley! MY GOD! What happened to you? Did you buy a new chest or something!?"

That got another laugh from Jackson. Miley ignored him however and gave Lily a bright smile. "Nope. They're all natural." she emphasized by fondling them.

"Are you serious!?" Lily shouted. "How! And where can I get my chest enlarged!?"

Jackson was full-on laughing now much to the two girls annoyance. He was just being obnoxious now. Miley was about to scold him when all of a sudden a much more devious idea came to mind. "Tell me Lily. Do you want a bod like this?"

Lily looked down at her now inferior frame. Y-Yeah."

Miley then reached into her pocket and pulled out her flip phone aging device. "Then this little gizmo will do it for you."

Lily raised an eyebrow. "Are you going to make a call?"

"What? No! This isn't a phone. It's an age transformer." Miley explained.

"Riiight!" Lily began.

Miley could tell her friend didn't believe her. That was understandable considering something like this shouldn't even exist outside of books and movies. Well it would seem a little more explanations and a demonstration were in order. Miley would spend the next serveral minutes explaining things while Jackson went to the can, completely missing this information.

"Oh! Okay. I think I understand now." Lily smiled. "So you're going to zap me and I can have a nice rack."

"Sure. Why not." Miley grinned. She typed into the phone... and fired.

By the time Jackson was done in the bathroom he had been greeted with the sight of a slight different Lily with a much larger chest just like Miley. The only difference being Lily chest was even bigger. How was that possible!? What was going on in here while he did his business? "Uh..."

"Hey Jackson." Miley greeted. "I have a festival to get to in a few minutes so while I'm gone, Lily here will keep you company. Make sure you listen to her because if I come back and she doesn't give me a raving review... you're dead meat. Ta-ta."

With that said, Miley gathered her shoes and left out the front door. Jackson gulped as his sister disappeared. Was Lily going to become yet another oppressor?

"Well now Jackson. It's just you and me."

1213111111121121.content:
"Don't worry Jackson, I'm not gonna do anything mean." Lily assured.

"Y-You're not?" He asked skeptically.

"Nope. In fact I'm gonna let you in on a little secret." Lily smiled.

Jackson was intrigued now. "What secret?"

"I'm going to tell you how Miley became the new alpha around here. She's got something straight out of science fiction. Something that shouldn't exist but does..."

"Well don't leave me in suspense... Just tell me!" Jackson complained.

Lily grinned. "She's got herself an age altering device."

Jackson stared blankly at the older woman. "Really?"

It was clear that Jackson didn't believe her. Why should he when the very idea was ludicrous. Technology like that just simply didn't exist in the real world. But it did now.

"I'm dead serious, Jackson. Think about. How did she all of a sudden get taller and get such a nice rack? Why do you now feels so small when you're in her presence? How do you think I got such a nice bust? Because I'll tell you it wasn't plastic surgery."

The younger man listened to each and every word the fell from Lily's mouth and the more she spoke the more sense she made. It shouldn't be possible but Miley must really have a device that could alter a person's age. But that just begged the question, "Where did she get it? And why?"

Lily shook her head. "Sorry. I don't have those answers. All I can tell you is this, we need to get the device away from her before she goes mad with power. I don't wanna loose my best friend."

Jackson nodded in understanding. Despite her earlier actions she was still his sister and he still cared. "Alright. Let's get that goober and turn her back to normal!"

"Thanks Jackson!" Lily cheered, bringing the smaller boy into a crushing bear hug.

"Okay. Let's get to work."

If only Jackson could see the Grinch-like smile that made it's way to Lily's lips as she hugged him close. She wasn't trying to stop her best friend out of the kindness of her heart.

No!

She wanted the power...

...All to herself.

121311111112112111.content:
While Miley enjoyed stretching Jackson's face like laughy Taffy, she failed to notice Lily walk up behind her. Before she knew it, she was flat on her back with Jackson keeping her pinned. "What the heck?!" Miley shouted in confusion.

"Lily! NOW!" Jackson roared.

The older woman wasted no time as she dug into the celebrity's purse. Said woman squirmed, kicked, and screamed when she realized what was going on. Her brother and best friend had formed some sort of alliance.

"Lily you traitor!" Miley screamed.

"This is for your own good!" Jackson answered in her place.

After a few seconds of digging, Lily finally claimed her prize... The gray cellphone. She held it up proudly with a wicked grin on her face. At long last, the prize was hers. "At last. The prize is mine."

"Haha! Way to go Lily." Jackson cheered. "Now let's get Miles here back to normal."

"With pleasure." Lily agreed.

"N-Now let's wait just a second guys." Miley begged. She wasn't ready to back to being a teenager just yet. She hadn't even gotten to experience all of life's pleasures as an adult just yet. Jackson jumped off her as Lily took aim and fired. "NOOO!"

In a flash Miley was back to being the same average chested teenager girl she always was. She looked down at herself with sadness and disappointment. It would seem her reign as the queen bee of the house was over.

"We did it!" Jackson jumped for joy. They had dethroned the self proclaimed queen bee. Now all Lily had to do was turn herself back to normal and all would be good. "Good job Lily. Now turn back to normal so we can smash this thing. Lily?"

Jackson turned toward his partner in crime only to catcher her smiling, caressing the age transformer like a newborn babe. He wasn't sure he liked that smile. It put him on edge. Something was very wrong here.

"Lily?"

The only adult of the group smiled wickedly at her pawn. "Sorry Jackson. But there's been a change of plans."

Jackson's eyes widened. "Oh no."

1213123112.content:
Joey didn't know why he was doing this. He hated sports. Yet a text from Maddie told him to meet her outside for a game of one on one. He thought about declining but seeing as he and Maddie didn't spend enough time together, he accepted. Who knows. he might even have fun?

He opened the slide door to the backyard and walked onto the makeshift court. There was no sign of Maddie, just the two rims and a basketball. Where was she? He carefully picked up the ball and dribbled it before calling out. "Maddie?! I'm here! Ready to get schooled?!"

"No. Are you?" The familiar voice of his 'big' sister called from behind. Had Joey been paying closer attention, he would've notice the shadow overtaking his own.

The tall bot smiled before slowly turning around to greet his opponent. What he saw next would be a sight he remembered forever. A stomach? Joey slowly cranked his neck up to meet the owner's gaze and when he did his eye widened. His glasses slid and the basketball felly from his hands, bouncing at this person's feet,

Said person couldn't help but smile.

"M-Maddie?!" Joey stuttered.

"The one and only." She answered as she scooped up the ball and spun it on her finger. "Ready to play?"

Joey shook his head. "No."
1213123112.title: Game Time

121312311222.content:
Before Joey could get away from his ten foot amazon of a sister, he found his means of escape cut off by... Was that a giant hand?! Not wanting to look but his curiosity getting the better of him, Joey tracked the arm the hand was attached to until he finally found it's owner.

Lying across the street on her stomach with her legs kicking back and forth in the air with her chin in her free hand was none other than his other older sister, Liv. Joey's eyes nearly popped out of his skull when he saw her. She was even bigger than Maddie! She had to be at least fifty feet tall!

"W-what?! H-how?!" Was all Joey could get out. His mind was a complete and utter mess. How was this possible?! The human body couldn't grow like this, and in such a short amount of time no less.

Liv simply smiled down at the stuttering mess that was her little brother. "Going somewhere, little Joey?"

Little Joey proceeded to gulp and back away nervously before bumping into something that made him jump. He wiped his body around quickly before falling flat on his rear. He looked up to see the giggling ten foot frame of Maddie towering over him.

This was all too much, he needed to find a way out of here.

"Sorry!" Maddie apologized through her fit of giggles. "Don't worry. No one's going to hurt you."

That statement did nothing to ease his fears.

12131231122232221.content:
Maddie hid comfortably at the gym. It was the perfect hiding spot. Liv would never expect her to hide amongst the man meat. Besides she'd probably be more preoccupied searching for her in the crowed of screaming civilians at her feet.

Watching them scamper around in panic at the sight of her 50ft sister was very entertaining. Maddie could feel the earth shake beneath her as her sister made her way through the city. From her hiding spot in the gym, she could make out Liv's enormous sandal clad feet crush an SUV.

The sight of the red vehicle getting leveled under Liv's foot sent shivers down her spine. Maddie wanted to try that the next time she grew. Being powerful enough to crush a car underfoot like a soda can looked like fun.

Up above, Liv ignored the screaming city folk in favor of searching for Maddie and Joey. Her brother would be easy to find as he was mostly likely where the technology was. Case in point, he was probably hiding in the Radioshack down the block.

As fun as ripping the roof off the store and dragging her brother out would be, she wanted a real challenge. She wanted to find Maddie and surprise her. The only question is where would she hide? She definitely wasn't amongst the crowed. Most of them had dispersed by now.

Liv looked around at the shops in the area and saw multiple places to hide. An arcade, a CVS, a video store, a news stand, and at last a gym. Wait a second?! GYM?!

The giantess facepalmed. It was so obvious. Maddie was an athlete. Where would an athlete feel safe hiding? A gym. Jeez, Mad was worse than Joey. She could just go up to the gym and call out to her but that would be no fun. Nah. If she was going to do this she was going to HAM it up.

Smiling wickedly, Liv walked towards the gym.

While she did this, Maddie watched closely as her giant twin approached. Had she already found her hiding spot? Impossible! She purposely chose something so ridiculously obvious that Liv would think to look elsewhere. The gym shook with each step the giant blonde took. Maddie closed her eyes and braced herself... And nothing happened.

She cracked her eyes open only to see Liv walk right past the gym, the sound of her footfalls slowly dwindling away. Maddie sighed in relief, she was only being paranoid. Liv was too smart for her own good sometimes. She would never check the gym first.

Right as the Maddie was about to relax, she felt the gym shake, and then went bug eyed as the roof was ripped away. Up above her was none other than the seeker herself. Liv had found her. Smirking triumphantly, the giantess plucked Maddie from the ground and held her in front of her face.

"Found you."

1213131125122.content:
It was a long weekend at the Duncan household, Bob took the boys out on a father-son camping trip, leaving the female members of the family home alone to bond together. As the youngest female Duncan was playing with her to us until she spotted a strange looking ray gun with a strange dial on it with words like “Age Swap” and Body Swap” and etc...

As she looking at it, Charlie hear her big sister and mother arguing about something again, it had been like that most of the week since Monday about something she couldn’t understand but wished they could stop.

“Mom, I told you that I was going to spend time with Spencer this weekend” Charlie’s big sisterTeddy shouted

“While I said No, that I wanted us to spend time together and go shopping and salon” retorted Amy Duncan, mother of Charlie and Teddy Duncan

Charlie had enough and wanted them to stop as pointed the ray gun at them and fired an energy beam at them. That also covered all three of them.

So what is the order of the swap?
Charlie becomes the new mother, Amy is the teenage daughter, and Teddy is now the youngest girl.

Or Charlie is the teenager, Teddy is the mother, and Amy is the youngest girl now
1213131125122.title: Triple Female Duncan Swap

choices: Punish them aka mess with the ray gun further
12131311251221.content:
Soon as the energy beam from the ray gun fade, the Duncan girls found themselves in new perspectives after opening.

“Why everything bigger? Why me in Charlie’s clothes” Teddy cried as she noticed she was sounding at a toddler and that everything was bigger than her now. Also she was wearing Charlie’s clothes

Amy looking down at Teddy, smiled and said “Serves you right, and look at me I feel like I’m a teenager again” as she was wearing Teddy’s clothes.

Teddy get mad and start to pound at Amy’s legs but it wasn’t effective on her.

“Alright both of you stop it now,” said a mature voice getting the two girls’ attention.

Amy and Teddy saw a blonde hair woman that was wearing Amy’s clothes with big curvy that made look like a model.

“Who are you?” Amy asked

“It’s me, Charlie, your daughter or now your new mother” Charlie answered surprising them both

“Wait who says that you are our mother now” Amy proclaimed

“That’s because I am, we all swapped ages and clothes,” said Charlie

Teddy was confused at what was going on, she was a toddler, her mother was a teenager and her little sister is an adult.

“What I don’t believe you.” Amy said

“Well this raygun say so as I zapped us since I have grown tired of you and Teddy fighting while Dad is away” Charlie explain

“Really, huh?” commented Amy

“Yes, so now I’m the adult here. I’m going to set some rules, and if you don’t listen, I’ll see what else this thing can do as I don’t mind taking care of two babies if I have to” Charlie said

So does Amy let Charlie set some rules or does Charlie have to punish Amy already

12131322222122122.content:
London Tipton was confused. When she retuned to her room on the ship the last thing she expected was to find a small black box sitting on her bed. Was it gift. Had her daddy sent her a present? Or did she have some sort of secret admirer?

The way she looked at it she was fine with either. She casually strode up to her bed and saw a small white not on top of the box. The words were too big and too fancy so she tossed it aside. She excitedly picked up the box and wasted no time peeling the top.

Inside was what appeared to be a golden wristwatch lined with diamonds. London's jaw practically dropped when she saw it. Never before in her life had she ever seen such a fine piece of wrist jewelry. It must be one of a kind.

She wasted no time in strapping it to her wrist. It's golden color matched perfectly with her black dress and golden heels. She just had to show this off to her adoring public. It was her obligation as a fashionista after al.

London was so caught up in her excitement that she filed to notice the instruction manual settled comfortably in the bottom of the box that had been long since discarded.

"I can't wait to show this off." She giggled.

With that thought in mind, London grabbed one of her many handbags and left her room. Had she been paying closer attention, she might've noticed what she had was no ordinary watch.

Meanwhile on another part of the ship, another crewmember felt a sense of dread wash over them. Their package was late. That couldn't be a good.

12132112.title: Grow her self  giantess Pim

121321121.content:
Pim pondered what size would be manageable for her until she remembered an old movie from a time before the early 2000s. A 1950s classic if she remembered correctly, Attack of The 50ft Woman. 50ft? Yes, 50ft seemed just perfect.

The blonde smiled deviously and carefully snuck her way outside into the backyard. It was almost midnight and that meant that there wasn't a soul on the street to witness her transformation. That too was perfect.

"Alright. Here we go." Pim told herself before took aim with the rat. She felt a tingly sensation run through her body and very soon she noticed herself rising.

The ground began to move further and further away and sure enough the roof of her home became visible. As a matter of fact, the rooftop of every house in the neighborhood became visible. Things were progressing better than she hoped.

"This is... what do people say in this era? Awesome!" Pim grinned as her height finally reached it's apex. She was huge, the biggest human alive, her own house didn't even reach her knees. "So this is what it feels like to be Nancy Archer."

Thankfully unlike the movie character she was emulating, her clothes grew with her. This sure would've been awkward if her own entertainment ended up with her being exposed to the elements.

Pim took a moment to look herself over and get a feel for her new inches. So far she felt about the same as she normally did when she was small. That meant 50ft was just right for her. Satisfied with herself, she pocketed the rat.

"Now to see what Phil is up to." The giantess said as she knelt down to look in her big brothers window. His room was completely dark which meant he was fast asleep. That should've been obvious given the time.

How should she mess with him she wondered? Their parents were out of town for the next three days on business and that meant it was just her, Phil and Curtis. Should she rip the roof off and scare him, or something else?

Her options weren't just limited to Phil now that she thought about it. There were a whole lot of people she could mess with at this size. The one that stood out the most was Phil's bestie Keely. She was also a good candidate.

Who did she mess with first?
121321121.title: Attack of The 50ft Pim

1213211211.content:
After giving it some though, Pim just shrugged. She was already home and Phil was available, so she might as well start with him. The blonde took a moment to crack her shoulders and collect herself before reaching out for the roof.

She grabbed a hold of the top of her happy home... and ripped it free from the rest of the building. There was no way to hide the sound of wood splitting and putty cracking, the very same sound that roused Phil from his sleep.

Looking up at where his roof should be made his eyes go wide. Where was his roof?! Why was he looking up at the stars?! And why was Pim all of a sudden a gargantuan monster?! Was he having another one of his night terrors?

That was the only logical explanation, wasn't it? A dream? Phil didn't know for certain, all he did know was a giant pair of eyes were fixed on him and their enormous owner was grinning from ear to ear.

"Well looks who's awake. How was your sleep, Phil?"

The older boy merely sunk into his bed more than he already was. Pim's voice was so loud and the way she spoke sent shivers down his spine. This wasn't one of his night terrors, was it? He was wide awake.

"What's the matter? Cat got your tongue?" Pim spoke again.

"I-I... Uh...?" Phil just couldn't get the words out. He was just far too scared. This was just like that movie Keely had him watch one! What was it called again? Attack of The 50ft Woman... or something .

Was this how Harry Archer felt when face to face with his wife? Probably. If this situation followed the movie in any other way then he knew for certain things weren't going to end well for him. Phil needed to find a way out of all this.

"H-Hey, Pimmy? You look... good. Did you do something with your hair?" Phil asked. Stupid idiot moron! His question was rewarded by a hand reaching down for him. "No! No! No! Pim, don't!"

Phil and his bed were suddenly picked up like a toy in a crane game. Instinctively the normal sized boy threw his covers over his face as the giant blonde let the bed rest in her palm. She couldn't help but smile at her brother's pathetic attempt to hid.

She carefully reached down with her free hand and tossed his covers aside. "No more of that. I can't see your face when you hide."

Phil was shaking like a leaf in the dead of night. How had this happened?! Where was the wizard when he needed it most? Oh that's right, he let Keely borrow it after he lost a bet? Dang it! Where was Curtis at the very least?

"Now that I have you dear brother." Pim teased. "What should we do next?"

Phil gulped.
1213211211.title: 22nd Century man

12132112112.content:
"Hmm? As fun as it is having you literally in the palm of my hand, this just doesn't feel right." Pim admitted. Hearing that gave Phil hope that he could convince his little sister to let him go. Preferably close to the ground.

"S-So does that mean you'll let me go?" Phil asked.

"Not a chance." the giant snored, crushing Phil's hope. "I just need to find out what's missing. Now let's see,,,"

While the giantess pondered what her little game was missing, Phil tried his best to conceive a plan of escape. He was too high up to jump and he had no phone to call for help. He could try screaming, but something told him that wouldn't be a good idea.

"That's it!" Pim snapped. "I know exactly what I'm missing! A partner in crime!"

Phil felt his blood run cold. What?! Did he just hear her right? A partner in crime! Would they also be a giant? Most likely as he couldn't imagine an average joe being able to keep up with the giant Pim.

"A partner in crime?" Phil dared ask.

Pim nodded. "That's right. Someone as big and strong as yours truly, and I think I have just that someone in mind."

"W-Who?"

Pim smirked slyly before rising to her feet. "Don't worry little Phil, you'll find out soon enough."

The 22nd century boy winced as he was forcefully along for the ride.

-----------------------
15 Minutes Later
-----------------------

"This is Keely's house." said Phil.

"I know." Pim grinned. The realization suddenly donned on Phil.

"Keely! No!"

"Why not?" she teased.

"The timeline! You could risk tearing it apart!" Phil tried to reason. Keely was important in the future, If anything happened to her past self the timeline could be drastically alter. That and he didn't want his best friend caught up in this mess.

Pim just waved his warning off. "Ah you worry too much. The timeline will be fine."

"Pim--"

"Quiet you!" Pim then knelt down to the small home and tapped on the glass belonging to Keely. The light was still on which meant the blonde must still be awake.

The giant didn't have to wait long as the window opened and said girl gawked at her enormous appearance. "Pim?!"

"In the flesh."

Keely then took note of the bed in her hand. "Phil?"

"Hey Keely." He waved nervously.

"So Keely." Pim addressed. "I'd like to make you an offer."

Keely looked nervous. "What kind of offer?"

12132112112111.content:
Pim smiled slyly as she gently placed her fellow blonde down. "Alright Keely, I can do that. But first... I have to age myself too."

Phil was stunned when her heard this and could only look on as Pim pulled out the RAT. Phil was shocked when he saw the little doohickey. That would explain why his little sister was suddenly a giant and how she would age herself forward.

Pim then placed Phil and his bed down by Keely. "Don't move she ordered." Phil quickly nodded. The giantess then adjusted the beam and opened fire. The normal went slack-jawed at what they were witnessing. Before their very eyes they were watching the teen age.

The first thing that happened was a slight increase in height followed by the crowing of a more ample chest and wider hips. Keely could feel her cheeks heating up and Phil could only feel dirty as his eyes lingered.

The next change to take place was the girl's face. It became more heart shaped and any traces of fat seemed to burn away. She still maintained a youthful look, but much more mature. She must've been in her late twenties, somewhere between twenty-seven and twenty-nine.

Once the ray finally finished it's work the pair were wide-eyed. What was once a middle aged teen had transformed into a drop dead beauty. It was like a caterpillar undergoing metamorphosis. Pim looked truly majestic.

"Wow." Was the first thing to drop from her lips. Even her voice was different. Slightly deeper and more refined. Phil couldn't believe it and neither could Keely. This was amazing.

The newly minted aged giantess took a second to look herself over and was in awe of herself. Her chest was large, her rear was fuller, and her hips... Holy crap her hips! She had hips for days.

The elder blonde smiled. "I could get used to this."

"Pim!? Pim!?" Keely called from below. The giant gazed down. "Don't forget about me! I wanna be bigger and older too."

Phil tried to intervene. "Keely that's really not a good idea..."

"Quiet you!" Keely interrupted. She then turned her attention away from the dejected boy and back to Pim. "So anyway, my turn!"

Pim smirked.

121321121121111.content:
Keely smiled in anticipation as she watched Pim aim the RAT at her. She'd never fully understood how all this future tech worked, but she didn't really care as the results were always interesting. Seeing the RAT make Pim older was proof of that.

"Get ready." Pim grinned.

"Fire away!" Keely mirrored.

And fire away Pim did. Phil started to blush as he watched his best friends body begin to swell in size. Keely had always been appealing to look at and now there was even more of her to love.

He just sat there in silence enjoying the show as she began to tower over the nearby trees and buildings. Before he knew it she was eye level with his younger/older giant sister. She really was a sight to behold.

"Oh. My. God!" Keely whispered, though Phil could hear her clear as day. The giant blonde scanned around her new surroundings and saw that the neighborhood looked more akin to a Kaiju movie set. "This is amazing." she breathed.

"I know." Pim agreed while checking her new companion over. Size looked good on her. She let the newly minted giantess get a feel for her new stature before addressing her again. "Alright Keely. I know you're having fun but it's time for part two."

That snapped her out of her trance. "Right! It's time to get older. Hit me with your best shot."

"That's the plan." Pim opened fire again and this time a new change took place. The first thing she noticed was a slight growth in height that took place before the more noticeable change in Keely's face.

Like with Pim it became more heart shaped and mature. Phil could feel his heart clench and his PJ's tighten when he saw her. It was just like the news broadcasts he saw in the future.

The next change that happened was the inflation of the chest followed by the growing of the rear. Phil's blush only grew deeper as the changes became more prominent.

Then just like that it was over. Pim pocketed the RAT and stared at the thirty year old Keely was her jaw slacked. She was gorgeous. It was one thing to see her on TV, it was another to see this version of her in real life. Pim felt somewhat inferior.

Keely walked to a nearby building and looked at her reflection. The face she saw staring back at her made her blush. That was her? She was hot! "Awesome."

God, even her voice sounded divine.

Pim whistled.

Phil fainted.

It was time to get things moving.

1213211211211111.content:
Phil groaned as he tossed and turned in his sleep. It was clear as day to anyone watching that he was uncomfortable. His face was pulled into a grimace and his had sweat running down his brow. He was probably having a nightmare.

"There there. Everything's going to be just fine." A voice soothed.

Phil could feel the gentle pressure patting him on the head and slowly he began to stir. "Keely? Is that you?"

"Yeah. It's me." She answered.

Still dazed and unaware of what was happening, Phil continued to speak. "I had the weirdest dream. Pim had turned into a giant adult and then she took me hostage until she found you and..."

"Shhhh!? It's alright. You're safe and sound right now... for the moment." Keely grinned.

"What?" Phil asked in confusion as he began to rub the sleep from his eyes. When his vision finally cleared and he took in his surroundings, he wished he was back in dreamland. He was currently sat in the palm of the giant adult Pim being flanked by Keely herself. "It wasn't a dream?" he whispered.

"Pardon?" Pim asked playfully.

"It wasn't a dream!" Phil repeated. Holy cow it wasn't a dream. Pim really did become a giant and by extension so did Keely. Both were colossuses, and add to that, older to boot.

"Nope. You're living in stone cold reality." Pim smirked.

"And the reality is this. We're in charge." Keely added.

Phil didn't like the sound of this. "What do you mean you're in charge?"

Pim rolled her eyes. "What do you think she meant. We're bigger and older and that means we run the show. You have to do what we say."

Phil's eyes widened,

"Respect your elders." Kelly finished.

Phil REALLY didn't like this. "What would you have me do?"

Pim and Keely looked at the normal sized boy with grins that would make even the bravest man turn tail and run. He would have too if not for the fact that down blow was certain death.

"I have a few Ideas?" Keely giggled.

"So do I?" Pim beamed.

Phil was trembling now. "Am I sure I'm not dreaming?"
1213211211211111.title: This isn't a dream

choices: Phil takes Keely to a fancy restaurant
Phil takes Keely to a fast-food restaurant
12132112112111111.content:
"Alright. Who decides first?" Keely asked her fellow giant.

"Well me, obviously." Pim stated matter-of-factly. She had Phil and the RAT, so why not her?

Keely didn't seem all too pleased. "Really, just like that?"

"Yeah. Just like that." Pim answered with mild annoyance. "I have Phil and the RAT, so why not me?"

Keely wouldn't give-up so easily. "Just because you have Phil and the RAT shouldn't automatically mean you get to go first. I wanna go first."

Pim's annoyance was growing. "Well tough tooties. I'm going first!"

Down in Pim's palm, Phil could hardly believe what he was hearing. Were the two seriously arguing about who got to do what with him first? Most of the terror he was experiencing began to evaporate as the two ''adults'', and he used the term loosely, began to bicker.

"Don't you tough tooties me!" Keely fired back. "Act your age!"

"Why don't you follow your own advice and let me go first." Pim argued back.

The bickering continued for another solid minute before the two finally settled down. Both women were stubborn and knew that neither would relent. So in the end it was Keely who came up with a solid plan.

The blonde giant bent down and grabbed a nearby car off the street between her hands and flattened it between them. Phil felt the blood drain from his face and the powerful display and Pim couldn't hep but be somewhat impressed.

"Okay, here's the deal... we'll flip this car. Heads I go first, tails you go first. Sound fair?"

Pim nodded. "Fine, but I want heads. I always pick heads."

Keely sighed at the childish display. "Whatever you say."

Kelly placed the flattened vehicle on her thumb before taking a deep breath... and flipped the care.

All three watched in as the car was sent flipping high in the sky. Pim prayed it landed on heads so she would get little Phil first. Her corns were just begging for a massage. Meanwhile Keely hoped it landed on tails so she could have Phil all to herself. Lastly, Phil hoped it landed on edge so no one got what they wanted.

The car began to descend. Keely was about to make a grab but was stopped by Pim. "Let it hit the ground."

Keely did just that as the car landed hard on the pavement. Sure enough the flattened car was upside down... tails.

"Ha! I get Phil first!" Keely cheered.

Pim huffed. "Fine! Here!" The giant dumped her "little" brother into his best friends hands and crossed her arms in bitter defeat. "Just don't hog him all night.

"Noted."

Phil groaned at being so violently dumped in Keely hands. Sure they were soft, so unbelievably soft, but he could have still been injured. Thank goodness he wasn't. Still, Keely won the car toss so that meant she got him first. Phil could feel himself sweating again. Just what did she have in store for him?

The blonde looked down and grinned. "Now that I have you Phil... you're going to take me out to dinner."

Everyone went silent for a second, both siblings brains shut down before the pair shouted in unison, "WHAT!!!"

"That's right." Keely winked. "You're taking me out on a date."

Pim's jaw dropped...

...And Phil fainted once more.

12133112.content:
CeCe still couldn't believe what she found on set. An age changing ray. At first she dismissed it as some sort of prank but knew it was legit the moment she tried it on an unsuspecting intern and he went from 40 to 18 in about a second. It blew her ever loving mind watching the balding man with the city miles de-age and go from ugly to hunky.

At first he was shocked. Then after looking himself over in the mirror for a minute he seemed to not mind. Why would he? It wasn't as if everyone got there youth back after it was gone. You're only young once they say. But here were benefits to being older. Cars, parties, wine, red carpets, it all sounded so glamorous.

CeCe thought about using the ray-gun on herself next after she figured out the settings but chose not to. Truth be told she wanted to age up someone specific. That person was none other than her best friend in the whole world, Rocky. Having her friend older would be just perfect. She always wondered what it'd be like to have an older sister.

With her mind made up she stuffed the gun in her backpack and went about her day with Rocky as she normally did. Once business on the set was concluded and they were both all danced out, CeCe and Rocky left the studio together. While walking CeCe convinced Rocky to follow her into a nearby alley where she could show off her finding.

"Alright CeCe, what is it that you want to show me?"

Said blonde smiled. She reached into her backpack before pulling out the age-ray. :Ta-da!"

"CeCe! Why do you have a gun?! Get rid of that thing!" Rocky panicked,

Seeing her friend's distress, CeCe quickly explained the situation. "Calm down Rocky it's not a real gun. Well actually it is a real gun but not the lead spitting one we see on T.V. This thing can make people younger or older. It's an age-gun."

"You're kidding, Right?" Rocky asked. That was one of the most ridiculous things she's ever heard and after knowing CeCe for as long as she had that was saying a lot.

"I'm serious!" CeCe wined. "I tried it out on an intern he turned into a hunk."

"Riiight." Rocky drawled out." It looked like CeCe wouldn't let this go. "If it's really what you say it is then why don't you give me a demonstration."

CeCe perked up at that, something that didn't go unnoticed by Rocky. It seemed she really thought this 'toy' gun could really change peoples ages. While she herself was very skeptical, she could at least humor CeCe. It wouldn't be the first time she cried wolf.

"That's the plan. So how old do you want to be?"

1213321121.content:
Lizzie saw it but still couldn't believe it. Kate Saunders, her former friend turned bully was now a full fledged adult. How was that even possible? The human body didn't just go from teenager to adult overnight. Something must've happened. The only question is... what?

*HONK!*

*HONK!*

Lizzie was broken from her thoughts by the sound a nearby car alarm. Looking around she then saw the now older Kate grinning at her. Oh that's right! She was so stunned by Kate's new transformation that she'd completely forgotten. Kate by order of her parents was now her new babysitter.

"Right." Lizzie sighed. This was beyond embarrassing and insulting. She was mature enough to take care of herself. It wasn't like she was going to have wild parties while her parents were away or go out late at night. So why even have a babysitter? Let alone Kate of all people.

*HONK!*

*HONK!*

"You can daydream all you want when you get home. Right now though it's time to get a move on." Kate called from the car window. She then threw on a pair of shades before getting back to the wheel. Lizzie knew standing still would reward her with another blast from the horn. With a defeated sigh, she entered the back seat.

"Now don't forget to buckle up. When you get your first car you'll say the exact same thing to however your driving." Kate grinned. Lizzie just gave her a sour look which only delighted her more. She'd clearly gotten under her fellow blonde's skin.

"First off, this is your mom's car. Secondly do you even have a license?" Lizzie asked.

Kate's silence was more than enough to bring a small smile to Lizzie's face. It seemed little miss adult didn't have many perks of her own just yet. Kate scowled. "Watch it Liz. I'm still the adult here and you will show me the proper respect. Otherwise things are gonna get ugly."

With her piece said, the two departed for Lizzie's home.
1213321121.title: Kate arrives to pick up lizzie

12133211211.content:
The two arrived at Lizzie's home with no issue. As they walked through the front door Kate couldn't help but feel a little nostalgic since she hadn't been here in quite some time. But that was the past and this was the present. What was done was done, right?

*SNAP!"

*SNAP!*

*SNAP!*

"Hello? Earth to Kate. Come in Kate. Do you read?" Lizzie asked whilst snapping her fingers. The moment they got through the front door Kate seemed to freeze up. It was weird. One minute she's talking about how she a big bad adult and the next she as still as a statue.

"Huh? What? Oh.. Liz. I'm fine, just got a little sidetracked, that's all." Kate admitted. "Anyway it's time to get back to business. I assume you remember my house rules so I won't bother explaining them again. So, let's kick off my first day as your new babysitter with a bang."

Lizzie didn't know where Kate was going with this but never the less waited to see what would happen. It was still strange though how she spaced out for a second only to come right back down to earth. If only she could read minds because there were times where she really couldn't understand Kate.

"My first decree as your new babysitter is that you will start dinner." Kate smiled. Kate looked at her as if she'd lost her mind. She didn't cook, at least not well. Just what was Kate playing at?

"What are you playing at?" Lizzie asked.

Kate's eyes narrowed. "Didn't we just talk about respect in the car. I gave you an order and you're questioning me. Since this is your second offense there will be a penalty. But I won't reveal it until after dinner. So hop to it or else."

Lizzie didn't know what it was but the way Kate said or else made her skin crawl. She immediately went to work trying to whip something together. In the meantime Kate decided to crash on the couch and wait for Lizzie to finish. Perhaps some T.V would help ass the time?

Kate grabbed the remote and flipped on the old boob tube to see that 'Life With Derrick' was on. That would certainly help pass the time. While she watched the character's bizarre antics she couldn't help but smile. Not only would she be having dinner at Liz's expense, but she couldn't wait for the penalty.

Life was good.
