121332131.content:
Before making herself an adult Kate noticed the ray had another set of buttons on the side. "Huh? What's this?" She examined the buttons closely and noticed a red one labeled "G" and a blue one labeled "S".

Confused she decided to test the buttons by aiming the blue one at the trash bin in her room. She fired the "S" button and watched as a blue laser shot forth and reduced her trash bin to approximately 5 inches tall. "Holy cow!"

She then tried out the "G: button and sure enough a red laser shot fourth and restored the trash bin to it's normal size. Kate's eyes were as big as dinner plates at this point. She never even asked for a growth and shrink function but she wasn't going to complain.

With this kind power she'd be unstoppable. Lizzie and her little entourage would never best her again. That's when the idea struck. If this thing could grow and shrink common household items then it stood to reason it could also grow and shrink people too.

Kate could see it now, her as an unstoppable giantess having an army of fools worshiping her around the clock. What made this fantasy all the sweeter was itty bitty Lizzie was down below painting her giant nails like a good little servant.

She had to do it now. She had to make that teenage girl power fantasy into a reality. Smirking to herself she ran out into her backyard before turning the ray on herself. "This is gonna be sweet."

With her mind calm and her aim true, she fired the "G" button and watched as the world around her dwindled away. She climbed higher and higher in size until she reached a comfortable 60ft tall. Thankfully her clothes had grown with her. Too bad the ray didn't. It was so tiny in her palm now it looked like an action figure's accessory.

Not wanting to loose it she shoved it in her ear to retrieve later. With that done, Kate took a moment to take in her new stature. She could see her whole neighborhood from up here. She could even make out the tiny people who were no doubt giving her odd stares. That was fine. Let them stare.

The giantess now grinned to herself before making her way over to Lizzie's house. It was time to go visit an old friend.

The tremor was massive, was it some kind of earthquake? No that couldn't be right, these tremors had a pattern. Earthquakes didn't keep a steady pace. Lizzie tried to look out her window only to see nothing of note except a few overturned trash cans and fallen mailboxes.

Not grasping what was happening the young blond rand downstairs hoping that the view from her backyard would provide her answers. So caught up in her own thoughts was she that she failed to notice the dark shadow that consumed outside. Nor did she notice the giant object in her path as she threw the backdoor open.

She was only broken from her thoughts when she crashed face first into said item and was sent crashing to the floor. "Ahhh! What hit me?" Lizzie groaned.

She then got a good look at what she bumped into as she propped herself up on her elbows. What she saw made her heart nearly beat out of her chest. Those looked like... Toes? What? That shouldn't be possible, no one's shoe size was this massive. Then she looked closer and noticed this was an open toed heel.

Her eyes widened as she scanned up the massive foot to the face of the person it belonged to. Needless to say all color vanished from Lizzie's face. It couldn't be? This wasn't possible!

"K-Kate?!"

Said giant smiled as she leaned in close. "In the flesh."

121332131222111211221121111.content:
Kate was cursing up a storm as she felt herself returning to normal. While she was a giant a bird had managed to get lodged in her ear and as a result it must've hit a switch on the remote. Before she knew it she was dwindling in size and the damn pigeon had flown the coop with the device in tow.

It would seem karma was coming around to bite her in the ass, conveniently enough the bird had dropped the device on the ground at Lizzie's feet. The blonde wasted no time in picking it up. Putting two and two together, she came to the conclusion that this little gizmo was the cause of all this trouble.

Looking at the device closely Lizzie could make out a few of the settings. Currently it was set to shrink and looking back at the still dwindling giantess it all made sense. A Grinch-like smile tugged at Lizzie's lips and fantasies of revenge took hold. She turned her attention fully to Kate and saw the girl was back to her normal height.

"Perfect." She whispered.

"Son of a..." Kate growled. Damn bird! She hated birds! Birds were her natual enemy. That feathered freak had cost her her fun time with Lizzie. Oh well, she could reach into her ear and... "Wait a second?" Kate said to herself. The device didn't grow with her wich meant it stayed it's normal size. Shouldn't she be in pain right now? Unless?

She frantically dug a finger into her ear and pulled out nothing but wax. The device was gone! Had it fallen out?! If so, then where was it?! The former giantess knelt onto the ground and bec=gan searching around until an all too familiar voice reached her ears.

"Oh Kate." Lizzie sung.

Lizzie? Oh, right. In all the commontion she'd completely forgotten about her. She craned her neck up to adress the girl and then went pale when she saw what was in her hand. Kate felt sense of dread building in the pit of her stomach. This wasn't good. The popular girl gulped.

"Now Liz... Let's not do anything crazy now."

"Crazy?" Lizzie parroted. "You mean like THIS!"

The blonde opened fire at her fellow blonde and watched on in satisfaction as her former tormentor dwindled even further in size. Kate's eyes began to bug out as she frantically stood up to try and take the device from the now taller girl.

She jumped as high as she could but all Lizzie had to do was hold her arm up. Kate began to panic as taking the device back was now impossible. Her eyes were even with Lizzie's chest, then her stomach, then her waist, then her shins, until finally she was eye livel with Lizzie's socked toes.

Kate was hyperventilating now. From the looks of things she had to be at leat a centimeter in height. An ant. Lizzie's pinky toe alone could crush her. How had the tables turned on her like this? Did karma truly exist?

The ant girl was only broken from her thoughts when a massive earthquake sent her careening to the ground. Looking straight ahead she could tell it was merely Lizzie stomping her foot that had caused this. Was she truly that insignificant now? A minor thing such as a stomp could shake her world apart?

Lizzie leaned in, her massive face consuming Kate's vision. "Now then little bug, what to do with you?"
121332131222111211221121111.title: Karma

1213321312221112112211211111.content:
Kate felt ill. This wasn't right. This was all wrong. This was supposed to be her moment of triumph over her former friend turned rival. Now she was a measly centimeter tall while her prey was now the one in control. Why couldn't anything go her way? Why couldn't she win once?"

That question would go unanswered as a large shadow loomed over her. Looking up in terror she saw why. Lizzie's skyscraper-like finger was headed straight toward her. Kate became the equivalent of a state as the massive limb descended.

Was this it? Was this how she would die? Squashed like an ant on the sidewalk by a damn finger. Tears began to build in her eyes. This wasn't hoe she wanted to die. Not like this. But as fate would have it, she wouldn't be crushed. Rather, she would stick to the finger like glue.

Apparently the limb was slick with a smelly liquid that Kate could only describe as saliva. This was so damn gross. Not only did it smell and seep into her clothes, it was like glue. Try as she may she couldn't move a muscle. She was completely and utterly stuck.

How humiliating.

Her world began to rise as she felt her stomach churn. The motion was so swift that if it wasn't for the saliva she might've been flung off somewhere. Eventually the motion stopped as she was now face to face with Lizzie's enormous eye. The pupil by itself dwarfed her.

"You know I've been thinking. Since you tried to use me as a servant it's only fair I get to do the same." Lizzie explained as she looked down at her sock. A lightbulb suddenly went off. "Since you made me get so intimate with your feet I'd figured it would only makes sense you get intimate with mine."

Kate felt her blood run cold hearing that. She could do nothing as Lizzie used her free hand to peel off her sock, exposing her foot to the cool outside air. The giantess smiled while the tiny blanched. She needed a way out of here. Oh why didn't she just use the age function and become an adult like she originally intended? Anything was better than this.

Lizzie grinned at the speck stuck to her finger. "Alright Kate, let's get this party started."

Kate screamed as the finger descended toward her massive enemy's foot. Lizzie was going to wipe her off like a booger or a piece of gum. Kate continued to scream was the finger made contact between Lizzie's big and second toes. Miraculously she hadn't been crushed by the contact. The soft skin saw to that.

No, instead Kate was stuck between Lizzie's big and second toes by leftover saliva.

"Perfect!" Lizzie cheered. "From down there you can worship my foot just fine." said blonde scrunched her toes and the resulting action caused a major tremble that partially freed the trapped girl. Lizzie's smile soon thinned. "Hmm. You're still too big for my liking. Hold on a second."

Kate felt her heart stop when Lizzie took aim at her again with the device. She was going to shrink her again?! "Wait Lizzie! Please!"

Her words never reached the giant as she fired again. Kate was struck again and Lizzie observed the speck closely as it seemed to vanish before her very eyes. Her smile again returned.

"Perfect."

1213321312221112112211211113131213211112.content:
Lizzie couldn't believe this. She was in a no win situation here. Melina had the device which meant she had all the power. Not only that, she just aged up her frenemy Kate into an authority figure. Why oh why was this happening to her? Just who in the universe did she piss off to such a degree?

"How do you feel, Kate?" Melina asked as the now 18 year old girl admired her new figure.

"I feel good. Really good." Kate answered truthfully. Originally her plan was to age herself up and dominate Lizzie before she figured out the gun could also grow things. Now it was like she was enacting her first plan, just not in the way she expected.

Melina nodded. "Good. Anyway, since Lizzie seems to be going through that teenage rebellious phase, you're in charge of her now."

"What!?/Seriously!?" The two said in unison.

"MmmHmm." Melina confirmed. "Since Lizzie won't listen to me, I've decided to punish her by rewarding her arch enemy. You're now bigger, stronger, and older, Kate. Lizzie is nothing but a child to you and it's your right as an adult to treat her as such."

Lizzie might've been flabbergasted at Melina's words, but Kate was seriously liking what she was hearing. All she wanted was to finally best Lizzie and put her in her place. Now she had the power to do so again. It wasn't ideal as she didn't like to play second fiddle, but she could manage.

"Don't worry, Mel. I'll whip this little brat into shape." Kate smiled.

Lizzie was floored.

"That's what I wanted to hear." Melina smirked. "I'm gonna go have me some me time. While I'm gone you'll be stearing the ship. Be sure that Lizzie doesn't make you crash."

Kate nodded.

"Oh, and if Kate doesn't give me a good report when I get back, Liz, I'll shrink you just like you shrunk Kate earlier."

Kate laughed as Lizzie's jaw hit the floor. This was going to be fun... for her.

"B-but this is Kate we're talking about! She'll just lie!" Lizzie tried to reason.

Melina thought about that while Kate glared dagger's into the younger girl's skull. "Alright. If I think she's lying, I'll shrink you both and make the two of you clean in between my toes."

Now both girl's jaws hit the floor.

Melina giggled. "You two play nice now."
1213321312221112112211211113131213211112.title: Lizzie In The Middle

choices: Kate and Lizzie somehow finish within three hours
Kate and Lizze fail to finish cleaning within three hours
1213321312221112112211211113131213211112.content:
"You really are the worst, you know that." Lizzie seethed.

"You've said that already." Kate said plainly.

"And I'll say it as many times as I want!" Lizzie snapped. "What's the matter with you!"

"Nothing." Kate said lamely.

Lizzie was having none of it. "You heard what Melina said before she left! So why did you try to lie to her!? Look at where we are!"

Kate did exactly that. There they both were at one 1-centimeter tall in between the massive toes Melina while she watched T.V. They'd been cleaning for what felt like hours with the miniature rags Melina had bothered shrinking for them. Even with the two of them working together, they'd made no headway.

They were just too small.

"It's your own fault Liz." Kate argued.

"How is it my fault!?" Lizzie asked in disbelief. Was Kate seriously trying to put all the blame on her?

Kate scowled. "You locked yourself in the bathroom the entire time and didn't come out after I went through the trouble of making dinner for us. Not following my orders is a sign of rebellion. Didn't Melina say I was in charge?"

"Yeah she said that, but I wasn't being a pain in the ass like you said!" Lizzie shrieked.

"Yes you were!" Kate fired back as she got in her fellow blonde's face. Not wanting to back down, Lizzie glared back at the older girl. The two were so dead set on blaming each other they'd completely forgotten where they were and what they were supposed to be doing.

No longer barely able to feel the two tinies cleaning between her toes, Melina looked down to see the two specks pressed against each other. What were they doing? Were they fighting with each other right now? Melina clenched her teeth in annoyance. They were supposed to be cleaning her toes.

Kate and Lizzie were so embroiled in their argument that they failed to notice the giant glaring at them. If they had they would've ceased their bickering and got back to work. "HEY!" Melina called.

Hearing that caused both teens to freeze.

Both gulped before slowly craning their heads up to see the annoyed face of Melina glaring at them with narrowed eyes.

"WHAT ARE YOU TWO DOING! YOU'RE SUPPOSED TO BE CLEANING AND SERVING OUT YOUR PUNISHMENT! INSTEAD, YOUR BOTH STILL ARGUING LIKE CHILDREN!"

Lizzie and Kate were starting to sweat now.

"MAYBE I WAS TOO MERCIFUL WITH YOUR PUNISHMENT? WELL I WON'T MAKE THAT MISTAKE AGAIN. YOU'RE STILL GOING TO CLEAN, BUT NOW YOU HAVE A TIME LIMIT. IF YOU DON'T FINISH CLEANING BETWEEN MY TOES IN 3 HOURS THEN I'M GOING TO LEAVE YOU LIKE THIS UNTIL TOMORROW."

Both Lizzie and Kate gasped! Melina couldn't be serious could she?

"AND IF I SEE YOU TWO ARGUING AGAIN... I'LL MAKE YOUR PUNISHMENT WORSE!"

The tiny duo broke off their argument and began cleaning again with renewed vigor. 3 hours. They had 3 hours. Could they even finish within that time?
1213321312221112112211211113131213211112.title: Lie and be punished

choices: Melina is pleased with Kates work and grows her
Melina leaves both Kate and Lizzie Tiny for the night
1213321312221112112211211113131213211112.content:
Lizzie and Kate continued their cleaning as instructed. To prevent anymore arguments from breaking out, Lizzie broke off to clean between the toes on Melina's left foot while Kate continued to clean in between the giant's right. The whole ordeal never improved despite the tiny duo's divide and conquer strategy. They were just too small for the job.

The conditions were still just as terrible on the left foot. The smell was still nauseating and left Lizzie reeling, She would've preferred to be trapped in an old folk's home than be anywhere near Melina's foot stench. Not to mention there was no chance in hell she would be able to clean the massive wall of toejam in front of her.

Even if Lizzie didn't voice it, she knew for certain she and Kate would be spending the night together tiny. This was a scenario perfectly designed for them to fail. If they were a little bigger then sure, they might have a chance, but being millimeters tall squashed any hope of that. Seeing as she was screwed anyway, Lizzie barely even tried.

Meanwhile back between the toes of the right foot, Kate was working like a woman possessed. She just had to try and finish. She didn't want to remain tiny for the rest of the night. Kate was working so hard she was coated in a mixture of sweat and dirt. So far she'd surprisingly made some good headway, mostly due to the fact she and Lizzie worked on this section together. A part of her wondered how her fellow tiny was doing, but quickly squashed those thoughts. It was every woman for herself.

Up above Melanie went back to her shows and occasionally snuck some glances down at the specks between her digits. From the looks of things they decided to split up and divide the workload. At least this way they wouldn't argue, but they would still fail. After all she designed this punishment to be a no win situation when she thought it. Either way they'd be her little foot servants for the rest of the night.

Speaking of the night.. Melina looked at the clock on the wall to see the tiny teens had about an hour left before she announced them as failures. The older woman smirked to herself before deciding to het more comfortable on her couch. She even scrunched her toes a bit just to mess with the ''ants'' below. She was truly and utterly relaxed.

---------------------
One Hour Later
---------------------

"TIME'S UP!"
1213321312221112112211211113131213211112.title: A No Win Situation

choices: Kate makes Lizze brush her teeth
Kate makes Lizzie clean her nose
1213321312221112112211211113131213211112.content:
Lizzie and Kate both froze up when they heard Melina's voice above. Time was up. They each knew they were nowhere close to finished on their respective assignments, that meant only one thing... They'd be spending the rest of the night as mere specks at the giantess' feet.

Both girl's gulped as Melina's face peered down at them, her eyes scrutinizing their. Lizzie had barely done anything as she'd given up halfway through. Being a mere speck guaranteed there would be no chance at success so she didn't even bother.

Kate on the other hand had far more work done. This was in large part due to the fact she and Lizzie started on the right foot together. Granted it wouldn't be enough in her mind to please the giant and regain her size, but maybe just maybe it would do... Something.

Looking between both feet at her tiny servants' work, she was quite displeased and at the same time satisfied. Satisfied that both girls failed and that meant she could leave them at their current size to service her at her leisure, but at the same time displeased at the individual work of Lizzie.

It appeared the tiny girl barely even scratched the surface. Their was still dirt and lint clearly visible for all to see. It was as if the girl wasn't even trying to finish. Then it hit her, and the realization made her blood boil, the tiny girl didn't try. She figured she was screwed anyway so she did as minimal work as possible.

That was unacceptable. It was like a person in school resigning themselves to failure and figuring they might as well relax while they did. That was a terrible mentality to have. If your going to do a job you should give it your all. A hundred and ten percent her dad used to say.

No, this would not do. Melina would not let this slight to her punishment go unpunished. She would teach the ''bug'' girl what happens when you disrespect her and her punishment. "I HAVE TO SAY I'M VERY DISAPPOINTED IN YOU BOTH. I GIVE YOU THE CHANCE TO MAKE UP FOR YOUR PAST MISTAKES AND YOU CAN'T EVEN DO A SIMPLE CLEANING JOB. BOTH OF YOU, EXIT MY DIGITS SO I CAN GET A BETTER LOOK AT YOU."

Both Lizzie and Kate did as instructed but were still very weary. Both stood in front of the giant with worry on their faces and fear in their eyes. What would she do with them now?

Melina smirked as she watched the two specks move. They were so tiny and helpless, completely at her mercy where they belonged. But Kate was of no interest at the moment, Lizzie was her prime target. Kate would just be providing an assist.

The giantess pulled out the size-device and adjusted a few setting before aiming it at the tinies. Kate and Lizzie went pale. She was going to zap them again!? Before they could even react, Melina pulled the trigger and struck Kate right in the chest. The tiny girl feared the worst, but in an instant she was back to her normal size.

Kate couldn't believe it and neither could Lizzie. Kate had to look herself over just to make sure this wasn't a mistake on the older woman's part. She looked back at Melina with confusion. "Why?" was all she could get out.

"Hmph. Because unlike Little Lizzie down there, you actually tried. You put your nose to the grindstone and actually tried your best. So I'm rewarding you."

Lizzie's jaw dropped while Kate muttered whispered words of thanks. "Thank you."

"Don't mention it. Now if you want to stay normal, you'll have to do me a little favor." Melina cooed.

"Anything!" Kate said swiftly.

The older woman grinned. "Punish Lizzie for me by teaching that ant the meaning of hard work. Do that, and I just might be inclined to reward you a second time."

Lizzie felt her blood run cold when she heard Melina's words. Internally she was cursing herself now. She should've cleaned Melina's toes with everything she had.

"Well now." Kate sounded. "What should I do with you?"

Lizzie gulped.

1213321312221112112211211113131213211112.content:
Lizzie was disgusted by Kate's suggestion, there was no way on god's green earth she was going to eat anything in this girl's nose. She would much rather starve. In fact she would much rather do anything else. Unfortunately for her though it would seem fate had other plans.

Lizzie looked around the dark and slimy tunnel she found herself in. She immediately wanted to vomit when she noticed the walls of the nostril coated in slimy and crusty snot. Did she really expect her to eat that if she got hungry? Had Kate finally gone insane? Maybe?

Then there were the boogers that were sporadically stuck in random areas. Some of which were as big as her if not bigger. This was insane. She couldn't do this... Just how in the hell was she supposed to do this!? Maybe she should make a break for it? Yeah, just run towards the light at the far end of the tunnel and jump.

That sounded good until she realized what would happen if she did. In fact she made a mental list of all possible scenarios. She'd either...

A. Fall to her death

B. Fall, miraculously survive and get lost forever

C. Fall, get caught by Kate and invoke the giant's wrath

or

D. Fall, get noticed by either giant and get crushed

All four options sucked. None of them had a positive outcome. As much as she hated to admit it, Kate was her only means of survival at the size and invoking her or Melina's anger would be akin to suicide. The blonde sighed in resignation. She had no choice. She would have to settle in and clean Kate's nose.

"With what though, my bare hands?" She laughed bitterly. She was so not looking forward to this. She walked over to the nearest wall and gulped nervously. There sat a booger just as tall as she was. Reluctantly she reached her hands out and griped the nugget.

She immediately winced at the green balls squishy consistency. It felt as if she just stuck her hands in a bowl of pre-chewed meat. She wanted to cry. She did actually, but stood firm and began to pull. With a little effort and elbow grease, she managed to free the green mass from the wall.

Lizzie cringed at her apparent success and quickly dumped the green ball to the ground. It left her arms and the front of her clothes moist and sticky. Her tears began to stream again. All she could think about while she trapped in this mucus filled cave was... "Why me?"

Meanwhile back in the outside world, Kate smiled as she felt Lizzie make her first stride in her new job. The quicker she cleaned out her nose, the sooner she could move on to other things.
1213321312221112112211211113131213211112.title: Putting Lizzie To Work

choices: Kate's reward is for her and Melina to become giants
Kate's reward is to amuse Melina
1213321312221112112211211113131213211112.content:
Lizzie didn't know how she did it, but somehow she managed to clean out the giant's nose. She didn't know how long she'd been at it but it must've been a while considering when she was finally released into Kate's palm she found both girl's had changed clothes and the sun was up.

The whole ordeal had left Lizzie both stronger and traumatized. She never wanted to see another nose for as long as she lived, even though such a thing was only a pipe dream. Her entire body was coated in goop, it looked like she just stepped out of that weird game show on T.V with all the slime.

All she wanted now was to return to normal size and take a bath. The two giants wouldn't really leave her like this, right? While she was lost in her own thoughts in the giant's palm, Kate presented her to Melina. "She did a great job. I can't feel any kind of blockage at all."

"Really?" Melina smiled. "That's good. It would seem you were able to teach our little friend here the value of hard work. Truly you were the best person for the task. Had you failed I might've actually shrunk you smaller than Lizzie."

Kate began to laugh nervously. "Haha... Yeah, right. So what now. You said if I did a good job you might reward me again."

"Did I now?" The older woman feigned ignorance. She then snapped her fingers. "Right! I did mention something like that. Very well. But first things first, please place Lizzie on the ground for me."

Kate nodded before placing the smaller girl on the ground below. Melina pulled out the device and opened fire. Slowly but surly the two girls watched as Lizzie grew back to her normal size. The poor blonde looked like she'd been put through the ringer. She was coated in dirt, grime, lint, and snot.

Kate of course laughed at this while Melina merely smirked. Lizzie on the other hand was too relieved to care at the moment she was finally back to normal. She never wanted to be that small again. In fact she never wanted to ever go inside the human body again. She'd leave those kinds of adventures to the cartoons on T.V.

"Oh Lizzie." Melina called, gaining her fellow blonde's attention.

"Y-yes." She cautiously answered.

"You look horrible. Go upstairs and take a shower." Melina ordered.

Lizzie stared at her wide-eyed. Did she just say shower? Lizzie couldn't run up the stairs fast enough. All she wanted was a shower. After being subject to feet and noses all night, this order was a godsend she wouldn't hesitate to follow.

As the pair watched Lizzie disappear upstairs, Kate finally turned her attention back to Melina. "What are you playing at?"

"I have no idea what you mean." Melina giggled.

"Fine. Play dumb if you want. Now about my reward."

"Don't worry. You'll have it soon enough. For now though let little Lizzie freshen up, then the fun can really begin." Melina said ominously. Kate didn't know whether she should like the sound of that or not, but for now she would just play along with whatever Melina had planned.

After all, she was dying to know what her reward would be.
1213321312221112112211211113131213211112.title: A Job Well Done

choices: Melina shrinks Lizzie to normal size
All three giants have fun in the city
1213321312221112112211211113131213211112.content:
After about an hour or so, Lizzie finally returned from her shower, sporting a blue sweat-suit that Melina left out for her. The trio then proceeded to go out for a girls day out around town. Lizzie was hesitant, but wisely chose not to voice her concerns.

The day started off well enough with some breakfast at a diner, all parties ordering pancakes with a side of eggs and toast with some orange juice. After what Kate and Lizzie had been through the night previous, there was no way they weren't going to clean their plates.

Melina smiled at the pair. The next part of their day consisted of visiting the various shops in the area. Shoe stores, jewelry shops, and clothing stores. The highlight being when all three went to the salon. Lizzie, Kate, and Melina couldn't remember the last time they felt so relaxed.

Once that was finished the tri noticed the sun was beginning to set. The sky was bathed in orange and the dead leaves that littered the streets were carried away by the wind. Today had been nothing short of spectacular. If only everyday could be like today.

As the blondes cut through the park, Melina came to an abrupt stop. Kate and Lizzie soon followed suit. Melina turned towards the pair with a sweet smile before addressing them. "Today sure has been wonderful, hasn't it?"

"It sure has." Kate agreed. Lizzie nodded.

"I'm glad you both agree. But as the saying goes, all good things must come to an end. It's time to end this day on a high note." Melina explained. "Kate?"

"Y-yes?" she stuttered.

"It's time I gave you your reward, don't you think?" Melina smirked. "Tell me... What DO you want?"

Hearing that left Kate puzzled and Lizzie nervous. Kate knew she would be rewarded after her successful punishment of Lizzie, but she didn't expect to be put on the spot like this. She literally had no time to think of anything. The days events saw to that. What did she want?

Lizzie began to sweat, what was going on in Kate's head right now? From the looks of things, she was clearly thinking over Melina's question. What would she choose? Would she ask for Melina to shrink her again? The though opened a deep black void in the pit of her stomach. That was the last thing she wanted.

What if she asked Melina to shrink the entire city so it fit on the palm of her hand? Would she ask for that? Could Melina actually do that? Would she even do that? Maybe? Truth be told, Lizzie wasn't even sure anymore. Power had already corrupted the older woman.

She was only broken from her thoughts when she heard the snapping of Kates fingers. "Oh I've got it!"

"Really?" Melina asked, anticipation seeping into her voice. She clearly wanted to know what Kate would ask of her.

"I want us to be giants! I want us to be the biggest things alive!" Kate exclaimed.

Lizzie's jaw dropped. "Wha--!?"

Melina's grin turned feral. "So you have wished it..." She whipped out the device. "So shall it be!"

Melina crashed her body into the pair and fired. The trio watched on as the world around them began to dwindle away. The trees in the park that once stood head and shoulders above them were now being reduced to models in a playset. The three girls just continued to expand and expand until finally... the expansion ceased.

Kate, Lizzie, and Melina all took in their surroundings with a sense of awe. The park was so tiny now, and the city itself looked like one big toy... or the set of a Godzilla flick. It was all just so... insane.

"Wow." Was all Lizzie could whisper out.

"Big and bad once again." Kate grinned.

Melina on the other hand giggled. "Oh ho! I'm liking this."

12133213122211121122112122.content:
As much fun as this was for Kate she still had school to attend. Granted she didn't really have to go because at her size there wasn't much anyone could do to actually stop her. but she still felt as though she should attend just to show off.

Thankfully since she and Lizzie attended the same school she could take her servant with her on the go without issue. Although in hindsight what issue would there really be? She was a giant and everyone else was an ant.

"Well Lizzie, since you did such a great job with my feet I think you deserve a reward." Kate smiled. "Being the oh so generous giant I am, I've decided to give my favorite follower a lift to school."

Lizzie was both stunned and confused. Stunned at the fact that in all the craziness that ensued she forgot about school. She was also confused in the sense that Kate had offered her a ride to school. For some reason that set off all kinds of red flags.

"What do you mean give me a lift to school?" she dared to ask.

Kate's smile never faulter. "It means exactly what it sounds like. You did a good job so I'm going to give you a lift to school... Literally."

Lizzie gasped as she had no time to move before Kate plucked her from the ground. The blonde tried to struggle but it was no use. Kate's fingers were like a crane and she was the plush toy being plucked.

"Now, how should I carry you I wonder." Kate teased. "Should I carry in palm like in The Iron Giant? Should I place you on the top of my head? Oh! Maybe I should place you on my shoulder like a pirate!"

"Shoulder! Shoulder sounds good!" Lizzie frantically shouted. She didn't trust Kate to not drop her, there was also no guaruntee that she wouldn't swing her head. The shoulder sounded like the best option.

The giantess hummed for a minute before shaking her head. "I got just the place!" She looked down at her shirt and saw the gargantuan megaton cleavage that was exposed. It was the perfect place to store her new servant. She be close by all snug between her twin mountains.

Lizzie seemed to follow Kate's gaze and when she understood what she had in mind her face went pale. "No! Kate I know what you're thinking! Please no! Not in there!"

"But it'll be perfect for you and besides you should feel honored, most boys would kill to be in your position." Kate reasoned before lifting her rival over her ample abyss. Lizzie could only scream when Kate released her. She was sent plummeting down with pinpoint precision in between the enormous breasts.

Kate shuddered when Lizzie made contact and could feel the tiny girl struggle. It was all for naught though as it only hastened her descent into Kate chest. The more she struggled the better it got for the giant.

"Mmm! Keep that up Liz and I might have to reward you again." Kate teased. With her servant safely secure, the giantess gave her bust one healthy squeeze before continuing onto school.

She couldn't wait to make her grand entrance.

As the three were about to go there separate ways the ground beneath them shook. Miranda almost fell, but Gordo was there to catch her. Claire meanwhile was leaned against the school's wall.

"Thanks Gordo." Miranda said.

"No problem." He smiled.

"What the heck was that?!" Claire shouted, completely annoyed by almost falling over.

"If I hazard to guess I'd say that was a tremor." Miranda answered.

"English please?"

Miranda sighed. "Earthquake."

"Oh." Claire said plainly.

Then another quake happened. Then another, and another, and another! There was a rhythm to tremors, almost like something was moving towards them. All three could only watch as the school's parking lot shook. Alarms sounded and trash cans toppled over.

And then it happened...

...She came.

Kate Sanders came from between two buildings in the city. Miranda, Gordo, and Even Claire all felt their jaws drop as she drew closer. She was massive, not to mention the source of the quakes. Where they dreaming? They must be, people didn't just grow 'that' big.

Eventually Kate came to a stop in front of them. Everyone was stunned into silence. They all craned their necks up, following those long legs all the way to the face that stood head and shoulders above all the rest.

"Kate?" Claire asked.

The giant smiled. "How's the weather down there?"

121332131222111211221121221112.content:
Claire felt a warm and tingly sensation building in her chest as she was engulfed by a bright red light. Whatever her friend zapped her with felt good, really good. It was then she started to notice the change that was rapidly taking place.

The ground seemed to be pulling away from her. Not only that but the school, people, and what remained of the school's parking lot seemed to be shrinking around her. Claire frantically looked in all directions until her sights settled on Kate.

Unlike everything else in the world, Kate didn't appear to be shrinking. In fact Claire saw she was rising up to meet her. That's when all the pieces of the puzzle finally fell into place. This device that was bathing her in crimson was the source of her friend's latest growth spurt.

Now she was sharing the power with her. It brought a smile to Claire's face as she continued to watch the world dwindle away. Soon she'd leave the little league behind completely and join her bestie in the big leagues.

Claire looked down at herself and saw while she still looked very much the same her size was definitely not. She was about waist level with Kate and kept on rising. She was also silently grateful her outfit grew with her. The last thing she wanted to be was a naked giant.

Her eyes then reached Kate's chest and the beam finally stopped when she and her giantess friend literally met eye to eye. Claire looked down at her feet and saw how diminished the 'small' world looked now. The school and parking lot looked like a kid's playset from her perspective. The people even looked like dolls.

She carefully bent down and picked up a red SUV which miraculously survived her growth and Kate's footfalls. It fit in her hand like an RC car at RadioShack. She was stunned silent. Kate saw this and couldn't help but grin.

"So Claire? How does it feel to be a part of the big leagues?" she asked, already knowing the answer.

Claire looked back at Kate and then back at the SUV before crushing it to scrap in the palm of her hand. "It feels good."

12133213122211121122112122111211.content:
"OMG! This is so cool." Claire mused as she fiddled with the Tinies in her hand. She could still hardly believe that she was now a 60ft giantess with three of the most annoying people she couldn't stand in the palm of her hand. "Just look at how tiny they all are. Kate, you really are the best!"

"Tell me something I don't know." Kate mused. This was great. Not only was she all powerful, she now had her best friend to enjoy all this power with. Just watching Claire mess with the 'ants' while she adjusted to her new stature was truly amusing. She then walked closer to get a better view of the action.

Lizzie couldn't believe how badly the situation had escalated. Having Kate turn into a giantess and making her into an unwilling servant was bad enough, but now Claire was a giant too. Worse yet, now her friends Miranda and Gordo were involved as well.

"Lizzie! What are we going to do?" Miranda asked.

'Yeah! A plan out of this situation would be nice?" Gordo added.

Lizzie unfortunately didn't really have a plan at the moment. She was a bit preoccupied earlier trying to survive Kate's breasts. So occupied was she that she failed to notice Claire reaching down to pluck her up. "What?!"

:"LIZZIE!" Miranda and Gordo shouted in unison.

Said blonde found herself dangling in front of Claire's enormous face while the much taller girl smiled. "Not so in control anymore, huh?"

Lizzie felt ill. Knowing that Claire literally had the power to crush her made her feel sick. Will she actually crush her or will or did she have something more sinister in mind? She didn't really know, all she did know was that she was being swung back and forth while the much larger girl laughed.

Miranda and Gordo were horrified by Claire's lack of care for their friend. They knew she wasn't fond of her but this was a tad bit extreme. They wanted to help, to cry out, but knew they were powerless to save their friend.

Watching Claire swing Lizzie back and forth like a piñata stirred up uncomfortable feelings in Kate. On the one hand her rival was being manhandled, on the other, Liz was once her friend. These feelings were quickly squashed however when Kate remembered that there was no turning back.

"Claire?"

"Yeah?" She answered.

"How about you stop swinging my servant for a bit. I have a great idea." Kate explained.

"I'm listening," Kate said as she ceased her motions, something all the tinies felt relieved by.

"We're all going to play a series of games. Two out of three."

"What games?" Lizzie dared to ask before Claire could.

"I'm glad you asked my servant as it would benefit you and your friends as well. If you and yours win, me and Claire will cease being giants." Claire was about to comment but was cut off by Kate. "But if we win, well... Let's just say you don't want to loose."

Everyone present listened and listened good. If Kate could be trusted then all they had to do was win two out of three and this nightmare would be over. But if they lost who knows what would happen?

After listeng for a while and thinking it over, Claire grinned. There was no way she'd loose at her size. "Alright. I'm game."

"Good." Kate nodded before turning to address the 'ants'. "And what about you three. I won't make this offer again."

"What are the games?" Miranda asked.

"The games are as follows, hide and seek, and thumb wrestling. The last game will only be revealed if you manage to win a game." Kate answered.

"Which you won't." Claire said smugly as she placed Lizzie back on her palm.

The reunited group of three talked it over and came to a decision. "Okay! We accept!"

"Hehehehehehe! Very good."

1213321312221112112211212211121111.content:
"To make things fair for you ants, this match will be three-on-one. At our size a standard one-on-one or two-on-two would guarantee certain defeat for you." Kate explained. "This way at least you'll have something of a fighting chance."

The group of three in Claire's palm listened well and felt a slight sense of relief. Even though they accepted the challenge Kate and Claire laid down, a part of them feared being crushed under their massive thumbs. The last thing they wanted was to be flattened.

"Thanks... I guess?" Lizzie said nervously. She looked around and noticed everything had gone silent. Awkward. "Okay, this is awkward. Anyway... If we're all a team then which one of you will be wrestling?"

"A good question. Claire? Do you want to take this one or should I?"

Claire smiled. "You've already had you fun being a giant and mine's is just getting started. I'll play with them a little."

Lizzie, Miranda, and Gordo blanched. They were going to go against Claire. Claire already didn't like them and unlike Kate, she might take things way too far. Even at normal size Claire had a habit of pushing things. The small group looked around each other nervously and nodded. They had no choice but to try and win.

"What's wrong little ones? Nervous?" Claire taunted.

"I think they are." Kate giggled. "Gordy looks like he's about to piss his pants."

"Gross! He pisses on me I'll crush him!" Claire fumed.

Gordo was now cowering behind both Miranda and Lizzie with no shame. He was scared sure and he could feel himself slowly loosing control of his bladder, but if it meant certain death then he'd find a way to hold it. Lizzie and Miranda on the other hand were just stunned by Claire's words.

"Alright. That's enough jibber jabber! Let's get this match underway!" Kate smirked. She walked over to the school and peeled off a part of the roof, revealing the gymnasium inside. She could help but laugh at the ants inside that looked up to her in both awe and horror. The best part was watching the gym teacher turn tail and run. What a weenie. "This gym's mine now. Clear out!"

No one moved.

She slammed her fist down. "NOW!"

The ants couldn't move fast enough as they vacated the area. Claire just watched her friend with big grin, power looked good on her. In fact, power looked good on both of them. The tiny group in her hand was just happy Kate didn't kill anyone.

"Okay. The arena is set."

Claire smirked down at the group. "Get ready to loose."

121332131222111211221121221112111121.content:
The small group of the three gulped when Claire placed them down on the gym bleachers. It was time to play. It was just them and Claire's massive thumb. Lizzie could feel the sweat falling down her brow and Miranda could feel her gut tighten. Gordo fought hard to not puke.

Claire placed her huge hand in front of them and made a fist, her thumb pointed up high. The two giants grinned down at them with a sickeningly sweet smiles that did nothing to hide their true feelings. Kate and Claire were going to enjoy watching them smiled.

"Well then. Get ready!" Kate ordered. Lizzie, Gordo, and Miranda got into position. Claire continued smile. Seeing everyone in position, Kate continued. "Alright, I want a nice clean fight. On my mark... 3-2-1 who will be the strongest one! FIGHT!"

Once the signal was given, Claire's thumb came down. Lizzie, Gordo, and Miranda's eyes went wide as the massive pillar of flesh came down on them. On instinct they all held their arms up to stop it's rapid descent, and much to their own shock, they weren't crushed.

The weight was unreal. It was as if they were holding up an iron coffin for three. The group's muscles burned and they could feel Claire trying to forced them down. Lizzie peaked her head up at Claire only to see a look of frustration. Clearly she expected this to be as easy as she claimed.

Unknown to the tiny group however, they weren't squashed because of their own efforts. No. Claire was pulling her newfound strength, allowing the group of tinies to believe they actually had a chance. What fun was there in just ending things? It was much more entertaining to watch the ants struggle.

"Geeze Claire's heavy!" Gordo grunted.

"Tell me about it! This girl needs to loose some weight!" Miranda agreed.

"Shhh! She'll hear you!" Lizzie warned.

Too late.

"WHAT DID YOU JUST SAY?!"

"Crap!" Miranda shrieked.

The weight increased. All three felt themselves drop to their knees and the sweat pour down their faces. Lizzie was the first to comment. "You an your big mouth!"

"I'm sorry." Miranda apologized.

"W-We need to think of a plan or we'll be crushed!" Gordo stressed.

Lizzie couldn't help but agree. If they didn't think of a plan soon they'd be screwed. She looked up a the giant thumb and then back at the giantess it was attached to. She bit her lip in thought until finally inspiration struck her. "Guys! On the count of three let go of the thumb!"

"What?!"

"Are you crazy?!"

"Trust me!" Lizzie urged. "When I say, let go and roll to the left."

"I'm not sure--"

"One!" Lizzie interrupted.

"You can't be serious!"

"Two!" Lizzie continued.

"She is!"

"Three! ROLL NOW!" Lizzie shouted.

Against their better judgement, Miranda and Gordo did as instructed and released their hold. Everyone rolled to the left and watched as Claire's thumb freefell to the ground.

"WHAT?!" Claire roared.

"Dogpile!" Lizzie shouted.

Gordo and Miranda got the message and all three jumped from the bleachers onto the massive limb.

"GET OFF ME!" Claire screamed, nearly deafening the group.

The ants felt the thumb beneath them struggle but failed to rise. "One!" Kate sounded,

Miranda was shocked. "Oh my god your plans working Liz!"

"Two!"

"Are we actually going to win this?" Gordo asked in disbelief.

Claire smirked. "I don't think so."

Before Kate could make it to three, the enormous thumb rose into the air. The tiny group hung on for dear life and turned their full attention back to it's owner. Claire was looking at them with a savage smirk that told them everything they needed to know.

They'd been played.

"Game over."

With a flick of her thumb, Lizzie, Miranda, and Gordo landed flat on her curled up index finger. They had no time to react as the wall of flesh came down and pinned them flat. All three felt the air leave their lungs from the sheer force.

"One... Two.... Three! It's over! Claire Miller wins!"

"Hey Claire? Let them up. I want in on this action." Kate said.

Claire looked amused. "Really?"

Kate nodded and Claire complied. She casually lifted her thumb as the once pinned tinies gasped for air. They seriously thought they were going to die for a second. What could've made the giant girl release them?

They all turned their attention to the only other giant present who was looking down at them with the same amused grin as Claire. Ah, so that was it. Kate must've made Claire release them. That was the only logical explanation.

"Listen up ants. As fun as it was watching Claire dominate you, I feel kinda left out. So we're going to do this again, only this time I'll be your opponent."

"What! No way! You said there would only be three games based on a two out of three structure!" Lizzie shouted, completely put off by the situation. Her two friends could only stare as if their friend had grown a second head. Had she lost her mind?

"You're in no position to complain bug." Claire hissed. "Our mercy is the only thing keeping you from becoming a smear on the pavement. Be grateful."

"It's okay Claire." Kate reassured before turning her attention back to Lizzie. "Think of this match against me as a chance to help improve your chances for the hide and seek round."

"What do you mean?" Lizzie asked in confusion.

"I'll explain when we get there. But for now know a victory against me will only improve your odds of success. However... a loss to me would put you at a severe disadvantage going into round two."

"What does that mean?" Miranda questioned.

Kate smirked. "If you loose then you'll be short one member for the hide and seek round."

"Short one member." Gordo gulped. "You don't mean..."

The giantess seemed to catch on. "No, we won't kill you. If you loose, Lizzie will stay with me for round two. That means instead of trying to find three of you we'll only have to find two."

"What?!" Lizzie shrieked. If they lost then she would have to stay with Kate for the next round? The thought of returning to the much larger girl's cleavage made her feel ill. They couldn't loose again. "Guys! No matter what happens we have to win, understand?!"

"Lizzie how are we--"

"I asked if you understood!" Lizzie interrupted.

"Yes!" Miranda yipped.

Gordo groaned. "We're boned.

"It's nice to know your competitive spirit is still intact." Kate joked now lets get this show on the road. We don't have all day."

Claire moved the tinies to the top of the bleachers and backed away to referee as Kate got into position. The group of three took up their stances as Kate eyed them all down.

"On the count of three... Begin! One!" Claire shouted.

Lizzie gulped.

"Two!" Claire called.

"You're all dead meat." Kate smiled.

Gordo and Miranda shuddered.

"Three!"

12211.content:
Kim was getting worried. Her limbs were still aching from having been squeezed inside a very small space; i.e. her room. The fact that she was currently 50 ft. tall and hiding in the Middleton Forest was also a problem. She thought that Ron had been gone for a rather long time; longer than it should have taken him, at least.

She sighed as she thought back to the mission that got her into this mess. It was supposed to have been an easy mission, but it turned out to be anything but.

She had gotten a call from C.R.O.P; the Centre for Research of Organic Produce, that their experimental growth-accelerator had been stolen.

Following several clues, she and Ron found out that it was Kim's archenemy, Dr. Drakken, whom had taken it. Although it was odd that he would steal a plant-growth device, one thing was certain; he had some kind of hare-brained new scheme to take over the world.

Kim and Ron quickly tracked down Drakken's latest hideout and infiltrated it. They had barely made it inside before Drakken's top henchwoman, Shego, showed up and engaged Kim in a melee.

Meanwhile, Ron had found the stolen device, but when he brought it back to show Kim, Drakken had appeared and tripped him, causing the device to fly out of his hands and hit the floor, which had caused it to activate and blast a beam of light at Kim.
Oddly enough, Drakken and Shego had both retreated after that.

Kim sighed again as she recalled how nothing had seemed to be wrong when they had returned the device. Unfortunatly, the effects showed themselves the next day, starting when she was...
12211.title: Kim

choices: ...hurry dowstairs and inform her parents about her dillema.
...call Ron. Perhaps he could help her in some way.
122112.content:
Luckily, things only started to get weird after she had been at school, although she had been feeling a bit strange all day.

She had been in the middle of looking up sales on the Club Banana website when her clothes had begun to feel a little bit tighter than normal.

At first she had dismissed it as a late growth-spurt, but as the tightness continued to increase she knew that something was wrong.

That was when Wade had called with some disturbing news. Because she had been hit by the growth-accelerator, it was likely the she would begin to grow as well.

Wade also explained that the larger the object that initially been, the bigger it would ultimatly get. When C.R.O.P. had tested it on their tomatoes, they had grown to the size of tractor-tires. So, by his calculations, that meant that Kim would likely grow to about 50 ft.

Then there was some good news and some bad news. The good news was that the effect would only be temporary. The bad news was that it would take at least three days for Kim to shrink back to normal, once her growth had stopped.

This wasn't good news, for with Kim about to grow to the size of a giant, she would be out of commision for days, giving Drakken and Shego plenty of time to do all kinds of evil deeds; which might have been exactly what Drakken had been counting on...

With Kim growing visibly bigger and her clothes now uncomfortably tight on her, she decided that she should first...
122112.title: ...at home

choices: Kim suddenly has a big growth-spurt, becoming 10ft. tall!
1221122.content:
Kim remembered the next part very well and in perfect detail. That was when the series of events began which led to her current, huge situation.

------

Ignoring the feeling of her ever-tightening clothes, Kim grabbed the Kimmunicator and hurriedly dialed Ron's number. He answered after two rings.

"Yo, KP," he said. "Funny you should call. I'm just outside your house, actually, and..."

"Oh, good! Get up to my room, quickly!" begged Kim desperatly.

Ron had rarely ever heard Kim being desperate before, so he hurried inside (saying a very quick 'hello' to Kim's parents) and up to her room.

"Okay; I'm here!" Ron exclaimed as he opened the door. "What's wro... WOAH!!!" He only now noticed that Kim was much taller than he remembered. "What happened to you, KP?"

"Remember when I got hit by C.R.O.P.s growth-accelerator?" said Kim, now approaching 6,7ft. in height.

"Yeah?"

"Long story short; it's making me grow too. All the way up to 50ft. to be exact. Wade says it's temporary, but it'll take days before I can shrink back to normal and we can't wait that long, because Drakken and Shego could do whatever they want until then!"

"So, what can I do?" asked Ron.

"I need you to go to C.R.O.P. and ask if there's a way to use the accelerator to stop the growth or something. Maybe we can find a way to reverse this before Drakken can take advantage of it. And don't tell my parents. I don't want them to worry."

"Right; I'm on it, KP!" said Ron with a salute, before he hurried downstairs again.

"Please hurry, Ron," said Kim as she reached a height of 7,1ft., her clothes now almost skin-tight on her.
------
What happens now?

122121.content:
"Oh my god." Boone said in awe. In the span of a few seconds she'd gone from a normal high-school teenager to a thirty year old woman. It was hard not to marvel at her own beauty as she checked herself over in the mirror. Her long brown hair was now much straighter and luscious as it cascaded down her back. Her face also seemed more defined, a mature beauty that would make others envious. She'd also received a minor increase in height as well. She was loving this, her wider hips and much more ample chest made her the walking embodiment of seduction.

Bonnie then turned her attention the TV remote-like device in her hand. To think this little gadget she stole off Kimi could actually make a person older. She remembered eavesdropping on the redhead and her blonde sidekick after their oh so successful mission. She didn't believe it at first, the very idea of controlling aging was ludicrous. But Bonnie's interest was piqued. She had to see for herself. Thankfully Kim's sidekick was a doofus and distracted the girl long enough that she forgot to close her locker fully.

When the timing was just right, Bonnie struck and spirited the device away. Kim didn't need to know. When the final bell rang and Bonnie made it home, she was relieved to find her home empty. Her mom and dad, and obnoxious sister were nowhere to be found.

Perfect.

She quickly went to her room and locked the door behind her. It was just her, the mirror and her new toy. She was nervous at first, wondering if this thing was for real. But steeled herself as this was probably a once in a lifetime opportunity. The device was a little confusing to figure out, but thankfully whoever made it wrote the instructions on the back. Bonnie typed in thirty on the remote and fired.

Which brought her to right now.

Bonnie smirked as she continued to look herself over. "I am so keeping this. Maybe I'll finally visit that nightclub my sisters are always talking about? Yeah, I'll do that. Or maybe... I could use this for something else."
122121.title: Use it on her self 30 year old Bonnie

1221211.content:
Bonnie had made up her mind, nightclub it was. But what was she going to wear? Her normal clothes wouldn't fit her now unless highwaters were suddenly in fashion. "What am I going to wear?"

These thoughts plagued her endlessly until a lightbulb suddenly went off. Why hadn't she thought of this sooner. She could just barrow one of her sister's dresses. Besides it wasn't like she was going to miss it.

With her mind made up, Bonnie made her way to her sister's room. She quickly rummaged through the closet, carelessly throwing clothes to the side until she saw it, the same dress she'd seen her sister wear only once. A dazzling black dress lined with glitter with two long slits at the legs. Just under it were a matching set of black heels which would cost the average joe an arm and a leg.

This is wat she'd wear when she took her new body for a night on the town. She could see herself now, the envy of her brand new peers, and the object of lust for the opposite sex. It made her feel cool, confident, powerful. She couldn't wait to try it on.

She easily stripped away her street clothes and again caught herself admiring her new figure. Maybe she'd also barrow some of her sister's finer underwear? After all, plain tan underclothes paled in comparison to a nice jet black. Simple, yet affective.

With a devious smirk she tossed aside her mundane bra and panties for her formerly older sister's finer underwear. She honestly thought she filled it out perfectly. Not mention it was ridiculously comfortable. She might just keep these.

At last Bonnie slid on the dress and Heels. She then walked into her sister's private bathroom were she kept her mirror. What she saw staring back at her was a goddess ready to have the world eating out of the palm of her hand. She didn't even need make-up.

"Sorry sis. But unlike you... I make this look good." Bonnie said to herself. She went back to her room for her purse and essentials, it was time for a night on the town. She'd just leave her parents a note before she left.

(Thirty Minutes Later)

Bonnie finally reached the nightclub her sister always rambled about, originally named 'The Club'. Bonnie had taken a taxi whose driver had given her a lift for free. All it took was one wink and the poor sap was putty in her hands. She could get used to that.

Trying not to look too out of place she threw on a pair of shades and made her way to the entrance. Bonnie couldn't be more pleased as no one even attempted to stop her from skipping the line, even the bouncer seemed smitten enough to just let her pass. Her ego was only growing from the experience.

Once she made it through those double doors and into the club, her smirk grew wide. The inside was just like the movies. Dark neon lights, loud techno music and fancy drinks being served at the bar. All around her people danced to the beat and made love to the booze. This was her kind of place.

As she walked down the glowing tile floor she noticed the people begin to stare. Why shouldn't they? She had arrived and that meant their lives just got a whole lot better. It was only natural that they were grateful. It wasn't everyday that Aphrodite made an appearance on the dance floor.

The only question now was who was brave enough? Who felt themselves worthy enough to approach her? Who thought they would get lucky? She didn't have to wait long as a tall and masculine stranger approached her. Her looked to be chiseled from stone and had a smile that could make any woman blush.

"Would you care dance?" He asked, taking a bow like an normal gentleman would.

Bonnie slowly removed shades and gave the man a sly smile. "I'd like that?"

122121131.content:
Bonnie gave her new and much preferred form a good stretch before getting out of bed. She knew by this time her parents would be at work and her sister would be off doing whatever it was she usually did. That meant once again she would have the whole house to herself.

That meant she wouldn't have to use her new toy to go back to normal just yet. There were still a few things she still wanted to do and experience, and one of those things would be seeing little Kimi's reaction to the new her. Yeah, it would expose her as the one who took the device from right under her nose, but she just couldn't resist. Besides she could just de-age Kim or turn her into a grandma if she tried to take it back.

That brought a smile to her face, Kim Possible as a senor citizen was something she'd have to see. Now another part of her hoped that Kim would provoke her. Well she could worry about that later, right now she needed to eat breakfast and wash up. She had a long day ahead of her and a rival to greet.

________
________


Bonnie Decided she'd walk the way to school. it was a nice day and she just wanted to feel the sun against her skin. She was dressed in one of her sister's short-shorts with a white tube-top and open toed heels. She also liberated one of her mom's handbags to store her junk. As she walked the way she smirked at the whistles directed her way and the sounds of cellphones snapping pictures.

She honestly felt like a celebrity when people stopped to look at her. She'd even caught sight of a few jealous girlfriends yelling at their men for staring. That made happier than anything else. She was just that good looking. Maybe she should go into modeling? She could see herself now, on the front of calendars, posters, ads, magazines, and even a few TV spots.

"Bigtime Bonnie." She said to herself. "That has a nice ring to it."

After half an hour of walking, Bonnie finally reached Middleton High. Student's were still just arriving per the norm and some even stopped and looked at her new more attractive figure. None of them recognized her, but that didn't matter. As much as she was enjoying the attention she was getting there was only one person whose reaction she craved.

Kim Possible.

"Hey KP! Hold up!" came a familiar voice. Speak of the devil, here came the redhead and her bumbling sidekick. Poor little Kim seemed to be upset about something while her friend Ron tried to lift her spirits. She must've figured out the device was gone.

"Sorry Ron." Kim apologized. "I just can't believe I lost the Age-Configurator." It frustrated her to no end. It was literally in her locker at school and yet it managed to vanish from right under her nose. Did someone steal it? If so than who managed to crack her locker's security?

"Hey don't worry Kim. You'll find it in no time." Ron smiled.

Kim smiled back. "Thanks."

"You're right about that." Came a familiar voice to the pair. The two turned around to see a stranger they'd never seen before. Ron was stunned into silence when he saw her, his face frozen in shock. Kim eyed the woman up in down with confusion and tad bit of envy. She was gorgeous! Then another thought came to mind, she was eavesdropping on them.

"Excuse me miss, but do I know you?" Kim asked. She was sure she'd never met this woman yet she looked very familiar and so different all at once.

The woman only grinned before striking a pose. "Come on Kimi. Don't you recognize me?

Kim couldn't explain it but a feeling of aggravation ran through her at that moment. The only person that could say so little and get her this riled up was... "Bonnie!?" She said with wide eyes.

"Bonnie!?" Ron said in equal surprise. This bombshell was Bonnie?

"B-But how? Wait! You stole the Age-Configurator!" Kim realized.

"It's not my fault you can't shut your locker." Bonnie said smugly.

Kim took a deep breath. "Bonnie. You need to give me that device back. It's unstable and could have some serious side effects."

"I think not." Bonnie smiled as she pulled the Age-Configurator out of her handbag. "I'm having way too much fun. You don't even know how good it feels to be older. There's just so many perks!"

"We'll grow up on our own time Bonnie. Now hand it over!" Kim demanded.

Bonnie frowned. No way was she handing this little doohickey over. That's when a devious idea came to mind. "Fine."

Kim let out a sigh of relief. That was easier than she thought. Right as Bonnie was about to hand over the device, a sick grin made it's way to her face. Before Kim could even react, she was blinded by a sea of red.

"KP!"

12212113131.content:
Kim was beyond frustrated, not only had she failed to get the Age-Configurator back from her rival/nemesis Bonnie, but now she and Ron where stuck driving down the highway with her. Or to be more precise, they were stuck in the backseat while Bonnie drove. To further add to her misery, Bonnie was in charge of her and Ron for the rest of the day.

Kim could still remember getting that dreaded phone call from her mom and dad. They were very displeased that she tried to skip class, although that's not what really happened. Bonnie set her up! As punishment the now older Bonnie was in charge. Well at least she wouldn't be miserable alone. Ron was right here with her. Misery really did love company.

"What's wrong kiddies? Your so quite back there." Bonnie mocked from the driver seat. The woman really knew how to get under her skin. Kim would much rather be dealing with Shego or even Hench Co. than her. Maybe life would throw her a bone and a world ending catastrophe could pull her away?

No such luck.

"Stop treating us like children." Kim grunted.

"Um.., Where exactly are we going?" Ron asked.

Bonnie smirked. "We're just going to run a few errands. That's all."

Kim didn't like the sound of that. "Define errands."

(Two Hours Later)

"Make sure you both pick up every last piece of trash. I promised Mr Barkin that this neighborhood would be spotless." Bonnie ordered from the hood of her car. She was enjoying a nice and refreshing glass of lemonade while Kim and Ron picked up trash.

"Aren't you going to help?" Kim asked in annoyance.

"You see I would, but I just don't feel like it." Bonnie smirked before dropping her glass. "Oops!"

Kim growled.

"Hey KP!" Ron called. "I found a half eaten Naco!"

(Three Hours Later)

"Kimi you missed a spot." Bonnie gestured to the large smudge on the large firetruck they were supposed to cleaning for the fire department. Kim didn't mind helping the local heroes but this was ridiculous.

"You can jump in at any time Bonnie!" Kim yelled.

"Yeah, sorry Kim but the department wants me to model for their calendar." Bonnie answered as she struck another pose. She was currently dressed in a yellow bikini while wearing one of their fire-hats. The department made sure to get as many snapshots as possible from every angle.

Kim's rage was growing.

"H-Hey! KP!" Ron laughed as the fire-dog licked him down. "I think he likes me!"

(One hour later)

"Make sure you get in between the shoulder blades" Senior Senor Sr sighed as he enjoyed his massage. It had been quite a while since he just sat down and relaxed without planning any villainy on the side. Plus that nice Bonnie girl had gotten Kim Possible of all people to handle his massage. What more could a supervillain ask for?

Kim cringed each time her hands made contact with elderly man's wrinkled skin. It was like feeling up a plastic bag filled with chicken bones. Just how did he stay so spry at his age?

Care to help, Bonnie!?" Kim desperately pleaded.

"No can do. Senior Senor Jr says he going to show me around the manor." Bonnie giggled.

Kim took a moment to look up at the slowly darkening and mentally screamed. What had she done to deserve this?

"Can I get some orange juice, Ronald?" Senior Senor Sr asked.

"Coming right up!" Ron answered before handing the elderly man his refreshment.

The elder smiled. "Great work." He then tipped the blonde boy.

Ron's jaw dropped. "Hey Kim! I just scored 500 bucks!"

Kim groaned. "Why me?"

(More time passes)

"And here's your stop Kimi." Bonnie teased. "Now remember it's wrong to skip class."

Kim said nothing, but the scowl on her face spoke plenty. She slammed the door to Bonnie's rental car before making her way inside, much to the older woman's delight.

If things kept on the way they did, she may just stay thirty.

1221211313131.content:
Kim felt as if her life was life was on a downward spiral. It must be. Why else would her parents so readily agree to have Bonnie babysit her over the weekend. She was old enough to look after herself damn it! Didn't they trust her? Wasn't she responsible enough?

Well that didn't matter now. As her parents and brother vanished to take care of a school thing, Bonnie had arrived. The age progressed woman was dressed in a strapless short red dress that barely hid her cleavage with matching heels and today she decided to mix it up with some red lipstick.

The redhead could feel herself growing green with envy, although she quickly squashed it down. She would grow up in time just like everyone else. That's what she told Bonnie. But now she was beginning to have her doubts. Yesterday for all it's annoyances was very eye opening.

Bonnie casual strolled into Kim's living-room with a smile on her face. Not only did she get to be in charge the last time they met, but now she was in charge for a whole weekend. Life was good. Everything was just coming up Bonnie. Now it was time for some fun.

"Well Kimi. As you know, your parents left me in charge." She giggled. How could she not? The grimace on Kim's face was priceless. "My house rules are quite simple. Rule 1: What Bonnie says goes. Rule 2: Bonnie's always right. Rule 3: No friends in or out of this house. Rule 4: Bedtime's at 9:00pm, no exceptions. And finally rule 5: Disobey and be punished. Got all that?"

Kim was outraged but nodded all the same, this was ridiculous! She hated this, but by order of her parents she had to obey. Bonnie's house rules were more like the rules of an oppressor if anything. And what was that last part about disobeying her leads to punishments?

"Define punishments." Kim asked warily.

Bonnie smirked before digging her hand into her large cleavage. Kim felt her cheeks heating up at the sight and as much as she wanted to look away she found herself unable to do so. Then much to her surprise, Bonnie pulled out the very thing that caused all this madness... The Age-Configurator.

"Disobey me and you'll wind up in the retirement home, or maybe back in diapers." Bonnie answered before making the device disappear back into her cleavage. Even she knew Kim would never attempt to reach down there. She didn't have the moxie.

The redhead looked stunned and dare she say she felt somewhat... Afraid. If she disobeyed her arch enemy/rival then she was either going to be receiving an AARP card or getting fitted for the new brand of diapers on sale at the mall. To make matters worse, Bonnie stored the Age-Configurator in the one place she couldn't reach. No way was she sticking her hand down another woman's assets.

Bonnie had her beat.

Seeing the look of resignation on Kim's face did wonders for Bonnie's heart. She had won the battle. Now was the time to win the war. "Now that you understand who runs the show around here, it's time for my first act as your new guardian. It's getting kind of late so it will be up to you to make dinner."

Kim nodded. Cooking wasn't her forte but she was sure she could scrounge something together.

"Oh, and I have expensive taste so I want halibuts, scallops, and some wellington." Bonnie added.

Kim's face paled, she didn't know how to make those things! Hell, she wasn't even sure she had the ingredients! At best she could maybe make... Something, but not that. Then she remembered her house rules. Disobeying meant getting zapped. It was better to try and fail then just not comply at all.

"I need to go to Smarty Mart!" She blurted out.

"Do hurry Kimi. Remember bedtime's at 9:00pm, no exceptions. And I'm starting to get very hungry."

"Aren't you going to give me a lift?" Kim asked.

Bonnie smiled slyly as the threw herself across the couch, "You see I would but my car was a rental and I took a bus to get here so..."

"Forget it. I'll just go on foot." Kim said before running out the house.

Bonnie watched as her oldest enemy sprinted away to get the ingredients for dinner, she was grinning ear to ear. She loved the control she had over Kim. It was amazing. Far better than even becoming a cheerleader. She kicked off her heels and began to get comfortable. It was going to be a long weekend.

For Kim at least.

Bonnie was driving Kim crazy. All day the older woman was running her ragged with mundane tasks. Make breakfast, make lunch, do the dishes, dust the house, do the laundry, etc. Kim was no stranger to chores, but never in rapid fire like this.

Her new 'babysitter' was a true taskmaster.

Kim needed to get away. The only reason she had any peace at the moment was because her slave driver was currently involved in bathing herself. Oh what she wouldn't give for a mission right now. Where were all the super villains anyway? Vacation?

Then to both her shock and relief, the telltale sound of her communicator went off. She wasted no time answering the call and seeing the all too friendly face of Wade.

"Wade! Oh you don't know how happy I am to see you right now! Bonnie's been driving me crazy!"

"Yeah, Ron told me what happened." He replied. "I still can't believe she managed to steal the Age-Configurator, and your parents left her in charge. The universe must really have it out for you."

"Tell me about it." Kim sighed. "So tell me, what's the sitch?"

Wade smiled. "Dr. Drakken and Shego broke out of prison again. From what I can tell it looks like they might be trying to build another Age-Configurator or looking for the original."

Kim also smiled. "Any idea where they are now?"

"I've narrowed down a few locations and it looks like they might be..."

Wade couldn't even finish his sentence as a new face greeted his screen. A face that made his jaw drop. It was as if he was staring at the living embodiment of beauty and perfection come to greet him and steal his voice away.

So this is what Bonnie had turned into?

"Sorry... Wade was it? But Kim's a bit occupied at the moment. She'll have to go on one of her little dangerous missions another time." And with that said she ended the call.

"Bonnie!" Kim shouted, completely ignoring the fact that the older woman was dressed in nothing more than a bath robe. "Why did you do that! There's trouble and I need to..."

"Let me stop you right there." She interrupted. "Rule 1."

Kim couldn't believe this. She wanted nothing more than to argue back but knew the consequences if she did. There was trouble but Bonnie didn't care. Kim didn't want to, but she swallowed her rising fury and complied. "Rule 1: What Bonnie says goes."

"Good girl." Bonnie smiled as she patted Kim on the head like an obediant pet. "You're little mission can wait, right now I have a more important task for you. Two actually. You see, Mister Senior Senor Sr told me you give a killer massage and I want to see if that's true. After that you and I are going to have a little girl time."

Kim felt her fury return in full force. That's what she stopped her mission for!? A damn massage and some stupid girl time! "That's what you interrupted my mission for!? Have you lost your mind!?"

Kim couldn't take it anymore, Bonnie had finally pushed her too far. It was one thing to be a pain, it was another to put the world at stake over her own selfish fun. It was about time she finally rebelled against her oppressor.

Bonnie didn't like this. Kim was ignoring the first two rules of Bonnie's house rules and that was something she would not tolerate. She was the adult here! SHE HAD THE POWER! But one look at Kimi's eyes told her she wouldn't back down.

Fine then. If she wanted to challenge her...

...Then challenge accepted.
